For example in Excel you can enter information into small separate cells that may form a table. On a webpage a cell separates items to contain them to a certain space on the page.
definition_uz: Ma'lumotni kiritish va shu hududga saqlash mumkin bo'lgan maydon. Odatda quti yoki to'rtburchaklar shaklida. Misol uchun, Excelda jadvalni tashkil qilishi mumkin bo'lgan kichik alohida kataklarga ma'lumot kiritishingiz mumkin. Veb-sahifada  maydon elementlarni sahifaning ma'lum bir joyiga joylashtirish uchun ularni ajratadi.

definition_eng: Anything that is created by a keystroke on your keyboard. It could be a simply one letter that is typed. A word typed would contain a number of characters.
definition_uz: Klaviaturada bosish orqali yaratilgan har qanday narsa. Bu faqat bitta harf bo'lishi mumkin. Yozilgan so'z bir nechta belgilarni o'z ichiga oladi.

definition_eng: A small box that may represent choices or options for different settings. If a check box is selected, a cross or a tick will appear in the box. This can either change or choose some setting or preference.
definition_uz: Turli xil sozlamalar uchun tanlovlar yoki variantlarni ko'rsatishi mumkin bo'lgan kichik quti. Agar katakcha belgilansa, qutida xoch yoki belgi paydo bo'ladi. Bu ba?zi sozlamalar yoki afzalliklarni o?zgartirishi yoki tanlashi mumkin.

definition_eng: A command to clear or delete information.
definition_uz: Ma'lumotni tozalash yoki o'chirish buyrug'i.

definition_eng: Command Line Interface is when you input text based commands to control the computer as opposed to using graphical user interface (GUI), which is graphics based commands.
definition_uz: Buyruqlar qatori interfeysi - bu grafik foydalanuvchi interfeysi (GUI) dan,, kompyuterni boshqarish uchun matnga asoslangan buyruqlarni kiritishingiz, ya'ni grafikaga asoslangan buyruqlardan farqlidir.

definition_eng: By default, to click is to press the left mouse button once. You can make the computer obey commands by clicking on certain items on a computer. For example you can click on a folder to open it. There are different variations to a click including double click, single click, and right click.
definition_uz: Odatiy bo'lib, bosish uchun sichqonchaning chap tugmachasini bir marta bosish kerak. Siz kompyuterdagi ba'zi elementlarni bosish orqali kompyuter  buyruqlarga bo'ysunishi mumkin. Masalan, jildni ochish uchun uni bosishingiz mumkin. Ikki marta bosish, bir marta bosish va o'ng tugmasini bosish kabi turli xil variantlar mavjud.

definition_eng: When you copy a file, word, picture, or anything on your computer, it is stored on a clipboard until you paste it somewhere or copy over it. For example if you copy a photo from the pictures folder and move to another folder, look around for a while, then paste it into my documents, the file was on the clipboard the entire time. Even if you have pasted it the file is there until you copy another file to the clipboard to overwrite it.
definition_uz: Kompyuteringizda fayl, so'z, rasm yoki biror narsa nusxa ko'chirilganda, siz uni biron joyga joylashtirmaguningizcha yoki ustiga nusxa ko'chirmaguningizcha u almashish xotirasida saqlanadi. Misol uchun, agar siz rasmni rasmlar papkasidan nusxa ko'chirsangiz va boshqa papkaga o'tsangiz, bir muddat atrofga nazar tashlang, keyin uni hujjatlarimga qo'ying, fayl butun vaqt davomida almashish buferida edi. Agar siz uni joylashtirgan bo'lsangiz ham, uni qayta yozish uchun boshqa faylni almashish buferiga ko'chirmaguningizcha, fayl mavjud bo'ladi.

definition_eng: Stands for Coder/Decoder. A piece of software or a device that adds support to programs so they can play certain audio and video files. It converts them into a format that your media player will understand. For example in Windows XP, Windows media player needs a dvd codec to be able to play dvd’s on your computer. Some software may include the required codecs.
definition_uz: Kodlovchi/dekoder degan ma'noni anglatadi. Muayyan audio va video fayllarni ijro etishi uchun dasturlarga yordam qo'shadigan dasturiy ta'minot yoki qurilma. U ularni media pleyringiz tushunadigan formatga aylantiradi. Masalan, Windows XP da, Windows media pleyrida kompyuteringizda DVD-larni qo'yish  uchun DVD kodek kerak. Ba'zi dasturlar kerakli kodeklarni o'z ichiga olishi mumkin.

definition_eng: A vertical row in a table running up and down. A simple row runs horizontal.
definition_uz: Yuqoriga va pastga harakatlanadigan jadvaldagi vertikal qator. Oddiy qator gorizontal ravishda o'tadi.

definition_eng: An instruction to perform a task. You can type a command into the run box or you can choose one from the many menus in Windows. Copy, paste, cut, open, undo, are all examples of commands available from a menu.
definition_uz: Vazifani bajarish uchun ko'rsatma. Ishga tushirish maydoniga buyruq yozishingiz yoki Windows-dagi ko'plab menyulardan birini tanlashingiz mumkin. Nusxa olish, joylashtirish, kesish, ochish, bekor qilish kabilar menyuda mavjud bo'lgan buyruqlarga misollardir.

definition_eng: A button you can press that will perform a command or action for you. For example we often have to press the OK button or the save button.
definition_uz: Siz bosishingiz mumkin bo'lgan tugma siz uchun buyruq yoki amalni bajaradi. Masalan, biz tez-tez OK tugmasini yoki saqlash tugmasini bosishimiz kerak bo'ladi.

definition_eng: Software, devices, and computer components that can work together without problems are compatible.
definition_uz: Muammosiz birgalikda ishlashi mumkin bo'lgan dasturiy ta'minot, qurilmalar va kompyuter komponentlari mosdir.

definition_eng: To compress something is to make it smaller. This can be done with computer files. Compressing a file to store saves space.
definition_uz: Biror narsani siqish - uni kichikroq qilish. Buni kompyuter fayllari yordamida amalga oshirish mumkin. Saqlash uchun faylni siqish joyni tejaydi.

definition_eng: A general term for all the included components that make up a computer. When people say the word computer they generally mean the whole system.
definition_uz: Kompyuterni tashkil etuvchi barcha komponentlar uchun umumiy atama. Odamlar kompyuter so'zini aytganda, ular umuman butun tizimni anglatadi.

definition_eng: The setup of something on your computer. It could be how to have configured settings in a software program to suit you. Or it could be how your computer system is configured to boot.
definition_uz: Kompyuteringizda biror narsani sozlash. Bu sizga mos keladigan dasturiy ta'minot dasturida sozlamalarni qanday sozlash bo'lishi mumkin. Yoki bu sizning kompyuter tizimingiz yuklash uchun tuzilgan bo'lishi mumkin.

definition_eng: The privileged workstation from which the operation of a computer system can be monitored and controlled. In current systems the console is usually a VDU or keyboard-monitor combination. In early systems the control unit at the console was often a teleprinter. As systems became larger and more sophisticated the consoles first became more complex and then much simpler as the development of operating systems advanced. Some recent medium-sized systems do not have a console.
definition_uz: Kompyuter tizimining ishlashini kuzatish va boshqarish mumkin bo'lgan imtiyozli ish stantsiyasi. Hozirgi tizimlarda konsol odatda VDU yoki klaviatura-monitor kombinatsiyasi hisoblanadi. Dastlabki tizimlarda konsoldagi boshqaruv bloki ko'pincha teleprinter bo'lgan. Tizimlar kattalashgani va murakkablashgani sari, konsollar dastlab murakkabroq bo'lib, keyin esa operatsion tizimlarning rivojlanishi bilan ancha soddalashdi. Ba'zi so'nggi o'rta o'lchamli tizimlarda konsol yo'q.

definition_eng: Usually a list of names, email addresses, or phone numbers. Most people store email addresses in a contact list because they can be hard to remember when you have hundreds.
definition_uz: Odatda ismlar, elektron pochta manzillari yoki telefon raqamlari ro'yxati. Ko'pchilik elektron pochta manzillarini kontaktlar ro'yxatida saqlaydi, chunki sizda yuzlab elektron pochta manzillari bo'lsa, ularni eslab qolish qiyin bo'lishi mumkin.

definition_eng: Where most system settings are stored for you to configure. You can access the control panel from the Windows start menu. When in the control panel you can press on an icon to see that areas customizable settings.
definition_uz: Siz sozlashingiz uchun ko'pgina tizim sozlamalari saqlanadi. Windows-ning ishga tushirish menyusidan boshqaruv paneliga kirishingiz mumkin. Boshqaruv panelida siz sozlanishi mumkin bo'lgan hududlarni ko'rish uchun belgini bosishingiz mumkin.

definition_eng: A record that contains control totals derived by summing values from other records in a file. The totals may or may not have some sensible meaning.
definition_uz: Fayldagi boshqa yozuvlardan qiymatlarni yig'ish orqali olingan nazorat yig'indisini o'z ichiga olgan yozuv. Jami yozuvlar  qandaydir ma'noga ega bo'lishi mumkin yoki bo'lmasligi mumkin.

definition_eng: A text information message that is stored on your computer when you visit a web page. When you return to the page the cookie is used to recognize you.
definition_uz: Veb-sahifaga tashrif buyurganingizda kompyuteringizda saqlanadigan matnli ma'lumot xabari. Sahifaga qaytganingizda cookie-fayl sizni tanib olish uchun ishlatiladi.

definition_eng: To duplicate information. You can copy a file and paste it to another location; however the original will remain intact in its previous position. Unlike cut, where the original is removed from its location and pasted elsewhere.
definition_uz: Ma'lumotni nusxalash. Siz faylni nusxalashingiz va uni boshqa joyga joylashtirishingiz mumkin; ammo asl nusxa oldingi holatida saqlanib qoladi. Kesishdan farqli ,unda  asl nusxasi joyidan olib tashlanadi va boshqa joyga yopishtiriladi.

definition_eng: The right to prevent copying. It is a negative right that can be exercised by a copyright holder both by means of civil proceedings and also by seeking a criminal prosecution. Copyright protects the form in which an idea is expressed but not the idea itself. It is the main legal protection for computer-based inventions. Under the WTO agreement all nations agreed to protect computer programs as literary works. Copyright law is now also used to limit the use that can be made of all digitally recorded information (programs, data, databases, etc.) to stop rental of works or use of works by multiple users without the payment of higher royalties
definition_uz: Nusxa ko'chirishning oldini olish huquqi. Mualliflik huquqi egasi fuqarolik protsessi orqali ham, jinoiy javobgarlikka tortish orqali ham foydalanishi mumkin bo'lgan salbiy huquqdir. Mualliflik huquqi g'oyaning o'zini emas, balki fikr ifodalangan shaklni himoya qiladi. Bu kompyuterga asoslangan ixtirolar uchun asosiy huquqiy himoya hisoblanadi. JST kelishuviga binoan barcha davlatlar kompyuter dasturlarini adabiy asar sifatida himoya qilishga kelishib oldilar. Mualliflik huquqi to'g'risidagi qonun endilikda barcha raqamli qayd qilingan ma'lumotlardan (dasturlar, ma'lumotlar, ma'lumotlar bazalari va boshqalar) foydalanishni cheklash uchun, shuningdek, asarlarni ijaraga berishni yoki bir nechta foydalanuvchilar tomonidan yuqori royalti to'lamasdan foydalanishni to'xtatish uchun ishlatiladi.

definition_eng: (Central Processing unit) This is the brains of the computer. It is a chip attached to the motherboard and controls and calculates data and is a vital part of your computer. Sometimes known as the Processor, the CPU comes in different speeds. I have a 2.8ghz processor
definition_uz: (Markaziy protsessor) Bu kompyuterning miyasi. Bu anakartga biriktirilgan chip bo'lib, ma'lumotlarni boshqaradi va hisoblaydi va kompyuteringizning muhim qismidir. Ba'zan protsessor deb nomlanadi, protsessor turli tezliklarda keladi. M:Menda 2,8 gigagertsli protsessor bor.

definition_eng: An illegally altered file that is made in order to steal a software program. A crack can make a trial version into a fully paid version without paying, therefore stealing the product. Sometimes an illegally obtained serial number is also used to crack a program.
definition_uz: Dasturiy ta'minot dasturini o'g'irlash uchun yaratilgan noqonuniy o'zgartirilgan fayl. Noqonuniy nusxalash sinov versiyasini to'lamasdan to'liq pullik versiyaga aylantirishi mumkin, shuning uchun mahsulotni o'g'irlaydi. Ba'zan noqonuniy ravishda olingan seriya raqami dasturni buzish uchun ham ishlatiladi.

definition_eng: A problem that occurs in the hardware or software that causes the computer to freeze up or stop functioning.
definition_uz: Kompyuterning muzlashiga yoki ishlamay qolishiga olib keladigan apparat yoki dasturiy ta'minotda yuzaga keladigan muammo.

definition_eng: Stands for control button. Found on both sides, bottom left and right, of the keyboard. Used to perform special functions such as selecting all (Ctrl-A)
definition_uz: Boshqarish tugmasi uchun stend. Klaviaturaning ikkala tomonida, pastki chap va o'ngda joylashgan. Hammasini tanlash kabi maxsus funksiyalarni bajarish uchun foydalaniladi (Ctrl-A)

definition_eng: To remove objects from a complex *computer graphics computation on the basis of a quicker test. For example, if the front faces of a cube are hidden by another object, all the geometry of the cube can be omitted from the calculation.
definition_uz: Tezroq sinov asosida murakkab kompyuter grafik hisoblashdan ob'ektlarni olib tashlash. Misol uchun, agar kubning old yuzlari boshqa ob'ekt tomonidan yashiringan bo'lsa, kubning barcha geometriyasini hisoblashdan chiqarib tashlash mumkin.

definition_eng: The pointer, usually an arrow or line, which is controlled by the computer mouse. When you move your mouse the cursor moves on your computer screen. Where ever it is placed in a text document is where the next letter can be typed.
definition_uz: Ko'rsatkich, odatda kompyuter sichqonchasi tomonidan boshqariladigan o'q yoki chiziq. Sichqonchani harakatlantirganda kursor kompyuter ekranida harakatlanadi. Matn hujjatining qayerda joylashtirilsa, keyingi harfni terish mumkin bo'lgan joy.

definition_eng: To remove a folder, file, graphics, or text from its original location with the intention of pasting it to another location.
definition_uz: Jild, fayl, grafik yoki matnni asl joyidan boshqa joyga joylashtirish maqsadida olib tashlash .

definition_eng: This is very similar to bullying at school however the bullying takes place online. It ranges from threatening email messages, slanderous information posted on the internet, to embarrassing videos and photo’s being shared with the world.
definition_uz: Bu maktabdagi bezorilikka juda o'xshaydi, ammo qo'rqitish onlayn tarzda amalga oshiriladi. Bu tahdidli elektron pochta xabarlari, internetda e'lon qilingan tuhmatli ma'lumotlardan tortib, sharmandali videolar va fotosuratlarni dunyo bilan baham ko'rishlardir.

definition_eng: Refers to the Internet world out there. When you are online you might browse through Cyberspace.
definition_uz: U yerdagi Internet dunyosiga ishora qiladi. Onlayn bo'lganingizda siz Kibermakonnni kezib chiqishingiz mumkin.

definition_eng: (cycle time) An interval of time in which one set of events or phenomena is completed.
definition_uz: (sikl vaqti) Bir hodisa yoki hodisalar to'plami tugallanadigan vaqt oralig'i.

definition_eng: A collection of facts, information, photos, text, anything, on a computer or on the internet.
definition_uz: Kompyuter yoki internetdagi faktlar, ma'lumotlar, fotosuratlar, matnlar, har qanday narsa to'plami.

definition_eng: A Database is a structured collection of data that is stored on a computer or server, the most used model of database is a relational database.
definition_uz: Ma'lumotlar bazasi - bu kompyuter yoki serverda saqlanadigan ma'lumotlarning tuzilgan to'plami, ma'lumotlar bazasining eng ko'p ishlatiladigan modeli relyatsion ma'lumotlar bazasidir.

definition_eng: Compressing data so it does not take as long to transfer from one place to another. For example data is compressed when you upload a file to the internet because this file is usually travelling through cables and phone lines.
definition_uz: Ma'lumotni bir joydan ikkinchi joyga ko'chirish uzoq davom etmasligi uchun siqish. Masalan, internetga fayl yuklaganingizda ma'lumotlar siqiladi, chunki bu fayl odatda kabellar va telefon liniyalari orqali o'tadi.

definition_eng: The process in which an operator uses a keyboard or other device to input data directly into a system.
definition_uz: Operator ma'lumotlarni to'g'ridan-to'g'ri tizimga kiritish uchun klaviatura yoki boshqa qurilmadan foydalanadigan jarayon.

definition_eng: A *file containing data, such as a file created within an applications program; for example, it may be a word-processing document, a spreadsheet, a database file, or a chart.
definition_uz: Ma'lumotlarni o'z ichiga olgan *fayl, masalan, ilovalar dasturi doirasida yaratilgan fayl; masalan, so'zni qayta ishlash hujjati, elektron jadval, ma'lumotlar bazasi fayli yoki diagramma bo'lishi mumkin.

definition_eng: n complex applications, the assimilation of information from many diverse sources. A data-fusion problem exists when a wide range of data essentially relates to the same problem despite being in many different forms and modalities, e.g. visual, textual, sensory, graphics. A classic example is the task performed by air-traffic controllers, who are able to assimilate, filter, and respond to many channels of data in order to assess a given situation. Although many techniques exist for associating, correlating, extracting, and combining data, this remains a very difficult area to automate
definition_uz: Murakkab ilovalarda, turli xil manbalardan olingan ma'lumotlarni o'zlashtirish. Ma'lumotlarni birlashtirish muammosi, agar ma'lumotlarning keng doirasi juda ko'p turli shakl va usullarda bo'lishiga qaramay, bir xil muammoga tegishli bo'lsa, mavjud bo'ladi, masalan. vizual, matnli, sensorli, grafik.Klassik misol - ma'lum bir vaziyatni baholash uchun ko'plab ma'lumotlar kanallarini o'zlashtirish, filtrlash va ularga javob berishga qodir bo'lgan havo harakati boshqaruvchilari tomonidan bajariladigan vazifa. Ma'lumotlarni bog'lash, korrelyatsiya qilish, ajratib olish va birlashtirishning ko'plab usullari mavjud bo'lsa-da, bu avtomatlashtirish juda qiyin soha bo'lib qolmoqda.

definition_eng: A graphical input device consisting of a glove with sensors that detect hand and finger movements. The hand position is usually determined by a sensor on the back of the glove.
definition_uz: Qo'l va barmoq harakatlarini aniqlaydigan sensorli qo'lqopdan iborat grafik kiritish qurilmasi. Qo'lning holati odatda qo'lqopning orqa qismidagi sensor tomonidan aniqlanadi.

definition_eng: A self-contained package of data that carries enough information to be routed from source to destination independently of any previous and subsequent exchanges.
definition_uz: Oldingi va keyingi almashinuvlardan mustaqil ravishda manbadan manzilga yo'naltirish uchun etarli ma'lumotni o'z ichiga olgan ma'lumotlar to'plami.

definition_eng: Resistance to alteration of data stored in a computer by system errors, so that only authorized and proper alteration occurs. Data integrity is a general concept with a number of different facets.
definition_uz: Tizim xatolari tufayli kompyuterda saqlangan ma'lumotlarning o'zgarishiga qarshilik, shuning uchun faqat ruxsat etilgan va tegishli o'zgarishlar sodir bo'ladi. Ma'lumotlar yaxlitligi - bu bir qancha turli jihatlarga ega bo'lgan umumiy tushuncha.

definition_eng: A coherent body of data with well-defined selection criteria and internal structure.
definition_uz: Aniq belgilangan tanlov mezonlari va ichki tuzilishga ega bo'lgan izchil ma'lumotlar to'plami.

definition_eng: Locating bugs (defects and problems) in a software program to repair and eliminate them.
definition_uz: Tuzatish va yo'q qilish uchun dasturiy ta'minot dasturidagi xatolarni (nuqsonlar va muammolar) aniqlash.

definition_eng: An electronic *logic gate whose output indicates whether a logical relationship is either true or false.
definition_uz: Elektron *mantiqiy eshik, uning chiqishi mantiqiy munosabatning to'g'ri yoki noto'g'ri ekanligini ko'rsatadi.

definition_eng: A computational task that for each possible input requires ‘true’ or ‘false’ to be output, depending on whether the input possesses a certain property.
definition_uz: Har bir mumkin bo'lgan kirish uchun "to'g'ri"" yoki ""noto'g'ri"" chiqishini talab qiladigan hisoblash vazifasi

definition_eng: A (hyper) surface in a multidimensional *state space that partitions the space into different regions. Data lying on one side of a decision surface are defined as belonging to a different class from those lying on the other.
definition_uz: Bo'shliqni turli hududlarga bo'luvchi ko'p o'lchovli * holat fazosidagi (giper) sirt. Qaror yuzasining bir tomonida joylashgan ma'lumotlar boshqa toifadagilardan boshqa sinfga tegishli deb ta'riflanadi.

definition_eng: A table that indicates actions to be taken under various conditions, the decision being the selection between the alternative actions.
definition_uz: Har xil sharoitlarda bajarilishi kerak bo'lgan harakatlarni ko'rsatadigan jadval, qaror muqobil harakatlar o'rtasida tanlovdir.

definition_eng: A *binary tree where every *nonterminal node represents a decision. Depending upon the decision taken at such a node, control passes to the left or right subtree of the node.
definition_uz: Har bir *noterminal tugun qarorni ifodalovchi *ikkilik daraxti. Bunday tugunda qabul qilingan qarorga qarab, boshqaruv tugunning chap yoki o'ng pastki daraxtiga o'tadi.

definition_eng: The process of reconverting a coded message to the message from which it was encoded.
definition_uz: Kodlangan xabarni kodlangan xabarga qayta o'zgartirish jarayoni.

definition_eng: The processing of an encrypted message by an authorized recipient in order to recover the original message.
definition_uz: Asl xabarni qayta tiklash uchun vakolatli qabul qiluvchi tomonidan shifrlangan xabarni qayta ishlash.

definition_eng: Committed entirely to a single purpose or device. For example, a computer system may be dedicated to the job of controlling an industrial machine tool.
definition_uz: To'liq bitta maqsad yoki qurilmaga mo'ljallangan. Masalan, kompyuter tizimi sanoat dastgohini boshqarish ishiga mo'ljallangan bo'lishi mumkin.

definition_eng: A value that is used when no other value has been supplied. Defaults may be stored in a configuration file, or they may be embedded in a program or permanently encoded into ROM, or read from the settings of a DIP switch. Nearly every application has defaults for something.
definition_uz: Boshqa qiymat berilmaganda ishlatiladigan qiymat. Standart sozlamalar konfiguratsiya faylida saqlanishi mumkin yoki ular dasturga kiritilishi yoki ROMga doimiy ravishda kodlanishi yoki DIP kaliti sozlamalaridan o'qilishi mumkin. Deyarli har bir ilovada biror narsa uchun standart sozlamalar mavjud.

definition_eng: A method for resolving conflicts and dealing with inconsistencies that arise in *inheritance systems and *non-monotonic reasoning. Default rules can contain components that define normality so that exceptions do not cause conflicts.
definition_uz: Mojarolarni hal qilish va *irsiy tizimlarda va *monotonik bo'lmagan mulohazalarda yuzaga keladigan nomuvofiqliklarni bartaraf etish usuli. Standart qoidalarda istisnolar ziddiyatga olib kelmasligi uchun normallikni belgilaydigan komponentlar bo'lishi mumkin.

definition_eng: A default search provider is a search provider that you have chosen to use through your browser. For example in Internet Explorer when you first set the program up it asks you to choose a default search provider. This means if you choose Google, then you will be using Google’s search services.
definition_uz: Standart qidiruv provayderi siz brauzeringiz orqali foydalanishni tanlagan qidiruv provayderidir. Masalan, Internet Explorer-da dasturni birinchi marta o'rnatganingizda, u sizdan standart qidiruv provayderini tanlashingizni so'raydi. Bu shuni anglatadiki, agar siz Google-ni tanlasangiz, Google qidiruv xizmatlaridan foydalanasiz.

definition_eng: A preset condition in something. For example in Windows a picture will by default be saved to the pictures folder on your computer. All programs and websites have default settings to start with and remain there until you choose to change these settings.
definition_uz: Biror narsada oldindan belgilangan holat. Masalan, Windows-da rasm  kompyuteringizdagi rasmlar jildiga saqlanadi. Barcha dasturlar va veb-saytlarda boshlash uchun standart sozlamalar mavjud va siz ushbu sozlamalarni o'zgartirishni tanlamaguningizcha u yerda qoladi.

definition_eng: Defragmentation re-allocates all files and compacts then into a neat, organized sections together therefore removing wasted space between the individual files. This brings the frequently used files to an area for easier and more efficient access and therefore making your computer run faster.
definition_uz: Defragmentatsiya barcha fayllarni qayta taqsimlaydi va ixchamlashtiradi, so'ngra birgalikda toza, tartibli bo'limlarga bo'ladi, shuning uchun alohida fayllar orasidagi bo'sh joy yo'qoladi. Bu tez-tez ishlatiladigan fayllarni qulayroq va samaraliroq kirish uchun maydonga olib keladi va shuning uchun kompyuteringiz tezroq ishlaydi.

definition_eng: The degree of polynomials that a given rule for *numerical integration integrates exactly.
definition_uz: Raqamli integrasiya uchun berilgan qoida aniq integrallashadigan polinomlar darajasi.

definition_eng: To remove a file or folder from your computer, which frees up space on your hard drive. To delete a file simply right click on it and choose delete.
definition_uz: Qattiq diskda joy bo'shatish uchun kompyuteringizdan fayl yoki jildni olib tashlash . Faylni o'chirish uchun uni o'ng tugmasini bosing va "O'chirish"" ni tanlang."

definition_eng: o delete text you can simple place your cursor on a word and press the backspace key. You can also select text by making it blue, and then pressing delete on your keyboard. You cannot delete text from a document you do not have access to. For example you cannot delete text from an article on webpage but you could delete text from a form you are filling out online.
definition_uz: Matnni o?chirish uchun kursorni so?z ustiga qo?yib, “backspace” tugmasini bosishingiz mumkin. Matnni ko?k rangga aylantirib, keyin klaviaturada “O?chirish” tugmasini bosish orqali ham tanlashingiz mumkin. Siz kirish huquqiga ega bo'lmagan hujjatdan matnni o'chira olmaysiz. Masalan, siz veb-sahifadagi maqoladan matnni o'chira olmaysiz, lekin siz onlayn to'ldirayotgan shakldagi matnni o'chirishingiz mumkin.

definition_eng: A measure of the amount of information in a given dimension of a storage medium. The density of information on a disk is almost always a fixed number of bits per sector, sectors per track, and tracks per disk. For magnetic tape it is the amount of information recorded per unit length of tape, usually in bits per inch or bits per millimetre. In general the number of flux reversals per inch (or per mm) is different because of redundancy in the coding. The density is stated for a single track
definition_uz: Saqlash vositasining ma'lum o'lchamidagi ma'lumotlar miqdorining o'lchovi. Diskdagi ma'lumotlarning zichligi deyarli har doim har bir sektor uchun bitlar soni, trekdagi sektorlar va diskdagi treklardan iborat. Magnit lenta uchun bu lenta uzunligi birligiga, odatda dyuymga bit yoki millimetrga bitga yozilgan ma'lumotlar miqdori. Umuman olganda, bir dyuymga (yoki mm uchun) oqimning o'zgarishi soni kodlashda ortiqcha bo'lganligi sababli farq qiladi. Zichlik bitta trek uchun ko'rsatilgan

definition_eng: Stored information that describes how other information is stored, e.g. in an array, record, or file.
definition_uz: Boshqa ma'lumotlar qanday saqlanishini tavsiflovchi saqlangan ma'lumotlar, masalan: massivda, yozuvda yoki faylda.

definition_eng: Sorting records or lists from Z to A.
definition_uz: Yozuvlar yoki ro'yxatlarni Z dan A gacha saralash.

definition_eng: A database concerned with design data, such as that used by *computer-aided design tools.
definition_uz: Dizayn ma'lumotlari bilan bog'liq ma'lumotlar bazasi, masalan, * kompyuter yordamida dizayn vositalari tomonidan qo'llaniladi.

definition_eng: In *program design, a template that provides a general solution to a common problem that recurs in different forms and contexts.
definition_uz: *Dastur dizaynida turli shakl va kontekstlarda takrorlanadigan umumiy muammoning umumiy yechimini ta'minlovchi shablon.

definition_eng: It is everything you see when you start your computer except the taskbar. Your desktop has the icons on it that are shortcuts to programs and folders.
definition_uz: Bu kompyuterni ishga tushirganingizda, vazifalar panelidan tashqari hamma ko'radigan narsangiz. Ish stolida dasturlar va papkalar uchun yorliqlar bo'lgan piktogramma mavjud.

definition_eng: A desktop computer was originally a computer that was built to be on top of a desktop. However now a desktop computer can be any computer that is not portable like a laptop.
definition_uz: Ish stoli kompyuteri dastlab ish stoli ustida joylashgan kompyuter edi. Biroq, endi ish stoli kompyuter noutbuk kabi portativ bo'lmagan har qanday kompyuter bo'lishi mumkin.

definition_eng: A person or company that produces software. The term is particularly used to describe approved producers of commercial applications software extending the use of existing software (e.g. ‘a Windows developer’)
definition_uz: Dasturiy ta'minot ishlab chiqaruvchi shaxs yoki kompaniya. Bu atama, ayniqsa, mavjud dasturiy ta'minotdan foydalanishni kengaytiruvchi tijorat ilovalari dasturiy ta'minotining tasdiqlangan ishlab chiqaruvchilarini (masalan, "Windows dasturchisi"") tasvirlash uchun ishlatiladi."

definition_eng: A device is a part of the computer or an add on that performs a particular task. A printer prints, a modem connects to the internet, a mouse communicates with the computer, a disc drive reads cd’s, and so on
definition_uz: Qurilma - bu kompyuterning bir qismi yoki ma'lum bir vazifani bajaradigan qo'shimcha. Printer chop etadi, modem internetga ulanadi, sichqoncha kompyuter bilan bog‘lanadi, disk drayveri kompakt disklarni o‘qiydi va hokazo.

definition_eng: A piece of software, which tells the operating system how to use a particular device. Each device needs Software to make it run. Sometimes drivers are automatically installed, however other add on devices may require you to install driver software. For example a printer comes with drivers on a printer disc.
definition_uz: Operatsion tizimga ma'lum bir qurilmadan qanday foydalanishni aytib beradigan dasturiy ta'minot. Har bir qurilma ishlashi uchun dasturiy ta'minot kerak. Ba'zan drayverlar avtomatik ravishda o'rnatiladi, ammo boshqa qurilmalarga qo'shimchalar drayver dasturini o'rnatishingizni talab qilishi mumkin. Masalan, printer- printer diskidagi drayverlar bilan birga keladi.

definition_eng: A dialog box can display on your computer screen and gives the user options to choose from or enter information into. For example if you open your systems properties box you can change settings and open more dialog boxes for each different section.
definition_uz: Muloqot oynasi kompyuter ekranida paydo bo'lishi mumkin va foydalanuvchiga tanlash yoki ma'lumot kiritish imkoniyatlarini beradi. Masalan, tizim xususiyatlari oynasini ochsangiz, sozlamalarni o'zgartirishingiz va har bir bo'lim uchun ko'proq dialog oynalarini ochishingiz mumkin.

definition_eng: Operating by, responding to, or otherwise concerned with the use of digits (i.e. discrete units) to represent arithmetic numbers, approximations to numbers from a continuum, or logical expressions/variables
definition_uz: Arifmetik raqamlarni, kontinuumdagi raqamlarga yaqinliklarni yoki mantiqiy ifodalar/o‘zgaruvchilarni ifodalash uchun raqamlardan (masalan, diskret birliklar) foydalanish, ularga javob berish yoki boshqa yo‘l bilan bog‘liq.

definition_eng: The number of subscripts or indexes needed to locate any element in the array
definition_uz: Massivdagi istalgan elementni topish uchun zarur bo'lgan pastki belgilar yoki indekslar soni.

definition_eng: A Disk is a magnetic drive such as a hard drive and a Disc is where the data is stored using lasers, like a cd drive puts data on a Cd disc. The cd disc is also has a disc shape.
definition_uz: Disk - bu qattiq disk kabi magnit disk va disk bu ma'lumotlar  bunda lazerlar yordamida saqlanadi, masalan, CD disk ma'lumotlarni CD diskiga joylashtiradi. CD disk ham disk shakliga ega.

definition_eng: A Disk Drive is a device for computer storage it normally stores the Operating System and other important files like images and documents by using a mechanical arm which records data to disks and also retrieves the data when requested as well.
definition_uz: Disk drayveri - bu kompyuterni saqlash uchun qurilma bo'lib, u odatda Operatsion tizimni va boshqa muhim fayllarni, masalan, tasvirlar va hujjatlarni disklarga ma'lumotlarni yozib oladigan, shuningdek, so'ralganda ma'lumotlarni qaytara oladigan mexanik qo'l yordamida saqlaydi.

definition_eng: Also known as a floppy disk. A floppy disk is old technology that held a small amount of data on a magnetic tape inside the disk shell. The data was transferred by a floppy disk drive. This is old technology so most newer computers don’t have this floppy disk drive.
definition_uz: Floppy disk sifatida ham tanilgan. Floppy disk - bu disk qobig'i ichidagi magnit tasmada kichik hajmdagi ma'lumotlarni saqlaydigan eski texnologiya. Ma'lumotlar floppy disk yordamida uzatildi. Bu eski texnologiya, shuning uchun ko'pgina yangi kompyuterlarda bu floppi disk mavjud emas.

definition_eng: Usually refers to some type of formatted information that contains text, tables, or forms. For example you create a document when you write a letter in Microsoft word.
definition_uz: Odatda matn, jadval yoki shakllarni o'z ichiga olgan formatlangan ma'lumotlarning bir turiga ishora qiladi. Masalan, siz Microsoft Word-da harf  yozganingizda hujjat yaratasiz.

definition_eng: On a local network the Domain is a group of computers that is run by at least one server (domain server) so that a set of policies (computer rules telling the computer who is allowed to do what) is permeated (passed) throughout the whole network in a quick and easy fashion.
definition_uz: Mahalliy tarmoqda Domen - bu kamida bitta server (domen serveri) tomonidan boshqariladigan kompyuterlar guruhidir, shuning uchun siyosatlar to'plami (kompyuterga kimga nima qilish huquqini bildiruvchi kompyuter qoidalari) tarmoqqa tez va oson butun bo'ylab kirib boradi (o'tadi).

definition_eng: Disc operating system. Invented by IBM. This is the basic command system on your computer. It still exists in some form even though Windows operating system seems to be the only thing on your computer. When you go to the command line and type a command this is through dos.
definition_uz: Disk operatsion tizimi. IBM tomonidan ixtiro qilingan. Bu sizning kompyuteringizdagi asosiy buyruqlar tizimi. Windows operatsion tizimi sizning kompyuteringizda yagona narsa bo'lib tuyulsa ham, u qandaydir shaklda mavjud. Buyruqlar qatoriga borib, buyruq yozganingizda, bu dot orqali amalga oshiriladi.

definition_eng: To left click your mouse on something on your computer two times. For example you have to double-click on a desktop icon to open a program.
definition_uz: Kompyuteringizdagi biror narsani sichqonchaning chap tugmasi bilan ikki marta bosing. Masalan, dasturni ochish uchun ish stoli belgisini ikki marta bosishingiz kerak.

definition_eng: To download something is to get it from the internet to your computer through your internet connection. For example, when you receive email to your computer the new emails are downloaded from your mail server. Now days people download everything including documents, information, music files, movies, games, cracks, cheats, and more.. To upload is the opposite of download.
definition_uz: Biror narsani yuklab olish uchun uni Internetdan kompyuteringizga internetga ulanish orqali olish kerak. Misol uchun, kompyuteringizga elektron pochta xabarini olganingizda, yangi elektron pochta xabarlari pochta serveringizdan yuklab olinadi. Bugungi kunda odamlar hujjatlar, ma'lumotlar, musiqa fayllari, filmlar, o'yinlar, hazillar, xitlar va boshqalarni o'z ichiga olgan hamma narsani yuklab olishadi. Yuklash yuklab olishning aksi.

definition_eng: Dots Per Inch, used in monitor and TV descriptions, tells you how many pixels the monitor or TV displays per square inch.
definition_uz: Monitor va televizor tavsiflarida qo'llaniladigan Dyuymdagi nuqtalar, monitor yoki televizor kvadrat dyuym uchun qancha pikselni ko'rsatishini aytadi.

definition_eng: To drag something across the computer screen. For example you could drag a photo from the pictures folder onto the desktop. Simply select the file, by making it blue, but keep the left mouse button pressed in while you move the file to where you want.
definition_uz: Kompyuter ekrani bo'ylab biror narsani sudrab olib borish. Masalan, rasmlar papkasidan rasmni ish stoliga sudrab olib borishingiz mumkin. Faylni ko?k rangga aylantirish orqali uni tanlang, lekin faylni kerakli joyga ko?chirayotganda sichqonchaning chap tugmasini bosib turing.

definition_eng: Usually refers to dragging a file and then dropping it to another location.
definition_uz: Odatda faylni sudrab olib, keyin uni boshqa joyga tashlab qo'yishni bildiradi.

definition_eng: A drive letter is an assigned alphabetical letter to a disk or logical drive, the reason for this is to allow an organized file system, there are drives which are automatically assigned certain letters like the old 3.5? Floppy Drive which is assigned the drive letter “A”, the even older 5.25? Floppy Drive is assigned “B”, the Hard Disk Drive which stores the Operating System is assigned “C” and CD/DVD and Blue Ray Drives are assigned “D” or if there are 2 “D” and “E” any other addition of hardware like a USB Drive is given the next available letter.
definition_uz: Drayv harfi disk yoki mantiqiy diskka tayinlangan alifbo harfidir, buning sababi uyushgan fayl tizimiga ruxsat berishdir, drayvlar mavjud bo'lib, ular avtomatik ravishda ma'lum harflar bilan belgilanadi, masalan eski 3,5 dyumli floppi disk, unga haydovchi harfi tayinlangan ". A

definition_eng: In Windows various applications and even websites have a drop down arrow, and if pressed will reveal a menu of choices. The arrow is facing down.
definition_uz: Windows-da turli xil ilovalar va hatto veb-saytlarda pastga tushadigan strelka mavjud va agar bosilsa, tanlov menyusi ochiladi. O'q pastga qaragan.

definition_eng: Digital Video Disk, this is mainly used as the name implies, to store movies to watch in a player, similar looking to a CD (compact disk) is can hold over 5 times as much and can be used to store things other than video, such as files, note that a DVD cannot be played in a CD player, but most Cd’s can be played in most DVD player.
definition_uz: Raqamli video disk, nomidan ko'rinib turibdiki, bu asosan pleyerda tomosha qilish uchun filmlarni saqlash uchun ishlatiladi, xuddi CD (kompakt disk) ga o'xshab, 5 baravar ko'proq sig'ishi mumkin va videodan boshqa narsalarni saqlash uchun ishlatilishi mumkin, fayllar kabi, DVDni CD pleyerda qo'yib bo'lmasligini unutmang, lekin ko'pchilik CD larni ko'pchilik DVD pleyerlarda  qo'yish mumkin.

definition_eng: A specification for providing a high speed digital connection for visual displays. It aims to provide a common interface for all display devices used by the PC industry.
definition_uz: Vizual displeylar uchun yuqori tezlikdagi raqamli ulanishni ta'minlash uchun spetsifikatsiya. U shaxsiy kompyuter sanoati tomonidan ishlatiladigan barcha displey qurilmalari uchun umumiy interfeysni taqdim etishga qaratilgan.

definition_eng: Capable of changing or of being changed. With reference to operating systems, the implication is that the system is capable of changing while it continues to run. As an example, the total amount of memory available may be defined by the contents of a word within the operating system. If this word can be altered without stopping the system and reloading a fresh copy of the operating system, then it is possible to alter dynamically the total amount of memory on the system
definition_uz: O'zgartirish yoki o'zgartirishga qodir. Operatsion tizimlarga ishora qiladigan bo'lsak, tizim ishlashda davom etayotganda o'zgarishi mumkin degan ma'noni anglatadi. Misol tariqasida, mavjud xotiraning umumiy hajmini operatsion tizimdagi so'zning mazmuni bilan aniqlash mumkin. Agar ushbu so'zni tizimni to'xtatmasdan va operatsion tizimning yangi nusxasini qayta yuklamasdan o'zgartirish mumkin bo'lsa, u holda tizimdagi umumiy xotira hajmini dinamik ravishda o'zgartirish mumkin.

definition_eng: In general, commerce using electronic media. Usually it is taken to mean commerce using the Internet, for sale of goods and services. Internet trading has expanded enormously over the last 20 years, with the creation of companies that only trade online
definition_uz: Umuman olganda, elektron ommaviy axborot vositalaridan foydalangan holda tijorat. Odatda bu Internetdan foydalangan holda, tovarlar va xizmatlarni sotish uchun tijoratni anglatadi. So'nggi 20 yil ichida Internet-savdo juda kengaydi, faqat onlayn savdo qiladigan kompaniyalar paydo bo'ldi.

definition_eng: Any form of education or training that uses computer technology as an essential part of the teaching process. The term covers a broad range of goals and methodologies, but two features frequently found are that computerized data and programs substitute partly or completely for the human teacher; and that students engage with all or part of the course remotely, for example over the Internet from their homes
definition_uz: O'qitish jarayonining muhim qismi sifatida kompyuter texnologiyalaridan foydalanadigan har qanday ta'lim yoki o'qitish shakli. Bu atama maqsad va metodologiyaning keng doirasini qamrab oladi, lekin tez-tez topiladigan ikkita xususiyat: kompyuterlashtirilgan ma'lumotlar va dasturlar inson o'qituvchisini qisman yoki to'liq almashtiradi; va talabalar kursning to'liq yoki bir qismini masofadan turib, masalan, o'z uylaridan Internet orqali o'tkazishadi.

definition_eng: Money that is exchanged through the Internet. In the early use of the Internet for commercial purposes there were concerns about fraud and security, and it was believed that users would be unwilling to buy items or services online. A number of schemes were introduced to set up a secure form of ‘Internet currency’. In the event these mostly came to nothing and most such transactions are by credit card
definition_uz: Internet orqali almashtiriladigan pul. Internetdan tijorat maqsadlarida foydalanishning dastlabki davrida firibgarlik va xavfsizlik bilan bog'liq xavotirlar mavjud edi va foydalanuvchilar onlayn mahsulot yoki xizmatlarni sotib olishni xohlamaydilar, deb ishonilgan. "Internet valyutasi"" ning xavfsiz shaklini o'rnatish uchun bir qator sxemalar joriy etildi. Aksariyat hollarda bu hech qanday natija bermadi va bunday operatsiyalarning aksariyati kredit karta orqali amalga oshiriladi."

definition_eng: A ticket that has no physical form but exists only in a computer database. E-tickets are most commonly used for airline bookings
definition_uz: Jismoniy shaklga ega bo'lmagan, faqat kompyuter ma'lumotlar bazasida mavjud bo'lgan chipta. Elektron chiptalar aviakompaniyalarni bron qilish uchun eng ko'p ishlatiladi.

definition_eng: Meaning to alter, improve or change an original document, image, video, sound or any other digital file. Editing is the modification of data.
definition_uz: Asl hujjat, rasm, video, ovoz yoki boshqa raqamli faylni o'zgartirish, yaxshilash yoki o'zgartirish ma'nosi. Tahrirlash - bu ma'lumotlarni o'zgartirish.

definition_eng: (Electronic mail) A document or message sent to an email server to deliver to a recipient over the internet.
definition_uz: (Elektron pochta) Internet orqali qabul qiluvchiga yetkazish uchun elektron pochta serveriga yuborilgan hujjat yoki xabar.

definition_eng: An email client is a program that lets you read, create emails, send, reply to, read, and manage your emails. Some examples of Email Clients include Outlook Express, Thunderbird, Incredimail, Pegasus and many others.
definition_uz: Elektron pochta mijozi elektron pochta xabarlaringizni o'qish, yaratish, yuborish, javob berish, o'qish va boshqarish imkonini beruvchi dasturdir. Elektron pochta mijozlariga ba'zi misollar orasida Outlook Express, Thunderbird, Incredimail, Pegasus va boshqalar kiradi.

definition_eng: To merge data or files together to become one package. For example you might embed an uncommon font type into a word document. This way when the document is opened on a foreign computer it will still contain the font. If you do not do this, and the foreign computer doesn’t hold the font, it will be replaced with a generic one and your document might look different.
definition_uz: Bitta paketga aylanish uchun ma'lumotlar yoki fayllarni birlashtirish. Misol uchun, siz oddiy shrift turini word hujjatiga joylashtirishingiz mumkin. Shunday qilib, hujjat xorijiy kompyuterda ochilganda, u hali ham shriftni o'z ichiga oladi. Agar buni qilmasangiz va xorijiy kompyuter shriftga ega bo'lmasa, u umumiy shrift bilan almashtiriladi va hujjatingiz boshqacha ko'rinishi mumkin.

definition_eng: Any computer used as a component in a device whose prime function is not that of a computer. One example is a weapons-guidance system. Another is a computer-controlled blood analyser that uses a computer to control various tests that are run on blood in order to produce an integrated printout of all test results. Many vehicles and domestic products now contain embedded computers
definition_uz: Asosiy vazifasi kompyuterniki bo'lmagan qurilmaning komponenti sifatida ishlatiladigan har qanday kompyuter. Bir misol, qurol-yo'l-yo'riq tizimi. Boshqasi kompyuter yordamida boshqariladigan qon analizatori bo'lib, u barcha test natijalarining integratsiyalashgan nashrini ishlab chiqarish uchun qonda o'tkaziladigan turli testlarni nazorat qilish uchun kompyuterdan foydalanadi. Ko'pgina avtomobillar va mahalliy mahsulotlar hozirda o'rnatilgan kompyuterlarni o'z ichiga oladi.

definition_eng: A method of including information from one application in another. For instance, a graph from a spreadsheet, the source, could be embedded in a word-processor document, the destination
definition_uz: Bir ilovadagi ma'lumotlarni boshqa ilovaga kiritish usuli. Masalan, elektron jadvaldan olingan grafik, manba, matn protsessor hujjatiga, maqsad manziliga kiritilishi mumkin.

definition_eng: Because people cannot always see you when chatting on the internet we have symbols and pictures that relay our emotions. If you type this : ) it means you are smiling or happy. Sometimes when you type this a program will convert it to a smiley face icon.
definition_uz: Internetda suhbatlashayotganda odamlar sizni har doim ham ko'ra olmasligi sababli, bizda his-tuyg'ularimizni aks ettiruvchi belgilar va rasmlar mavjud. Agar siz buni yozsangiz: ) bu siz tabassum qilayotganingizni yoki baxtli ekanligingizni bildiradi. Ba'zan siz buni yozganingizda dastur uni tabassum belgisiga aylantiradi.

definition_eng: A security mechanism that uses a password usually to ‘scramble’ the data in such a way that only the original password can decrypt it.
definition_uz: Odatda parolni faqat asl parol shifrini ochishi mumkin bo'lgan tarzda ma'lumotlarni "shifrlash"" uchun ishlatadigan xavfsizlik mexanizmi."

definition_eng: This refers to a chair purposely designed to fit the comfort needs of the user with considerations such as surrounding environment taken into account.
definition_uz: Bu atrof-muhitni hisobga olgan holda foydalanuvchining qulaylik ehtiyojlarini qondirish uchun mo'ljallangan stulni nazarda tutadi.

definition_eng: A LAN (local area network) connection method. Plugging an Ethernet cable (usually blue) from a computers Ethernet port to a modem usually connects you to the internet. Therefore you have and Ethernet connection.
definition_uz: LAN (mahalliy tarmoq) ulanish usuli. Kompyuterning chekilgan portidan modemga Ethernet kabelini (odatda ko'k) ulash odatda sizni internetga ulaydi. Shunday qilib, sizda Ethernet ulanishi mavjud bo'ladi.

definition_eng: (End User License Agreement) A text file that usually accompanies software and is the legal agreement between the manufacturer and a purchaser. When you install a program and press accept you are agreeing to these terms.
definition_uz: (Oxirgi foydalanuvchi litsenziya shartnomasi) Odatda dasturiy ta'minotga hamroh bo'lgan va ishlab chiqaruvchi va xaridor o'rtasidagi qonuniy kelishuv bo'lgan matnli fayl. Dasturni o'rnatganingizda va "Qabul qilish"" tugmasini bosganingizda

definition_eng: Usually to start or perform something. Either to start a program or to carry out an action. A file that can execute something usually has the file extension like .exe.
definition_uz: Odatda biror narsani boshlash yoki bajarish. Yoki dasturni boshlash yoki biror harakatni amalga oshirish. Biror narsani bajara oladigan fayl odatda .exe kabi fayl kengaytmasiga ega.

definition_eng: A file with .exe file extension meaning it is usually an install or setup file. When you press on a .exe file it will install a program.
definition_uz: .exe fayl kengaytmali fayl odatda o'rnatish yoki sozlash faylidir. .exe faylini bosganingizda, u dasturni o'rnatadi.

definition_eng: To remove a copy of information from a program that can be imported back at a later date. It could also be imported into a suitably compatible program. For example you can export your contacts list from Outlook Express and import it to Thunderbird.
definition_uz: Keyinchalik import qilinadigan dasturdan ma'lumotlar nusxasini olib tashlash. Shuningdek, uni mos keladigan dasturga import qilish mumkin. Masalan, Outlook Express-dan kontaktlar ro'yxatini eksport qilishingiz va Thunderbird-ga import qilishingiz mumkin.

definition_eng: A file extension identifies labels a file and lets you know what program will open it. For example a file with .txt is a text file and can be opened with notepad. A file with .jpg is a picture file and can be opened in the paint program.
definition_uz: Fayl kengaytmasi fayl yorliqlarini aniqlaydi va uni qaysi dastur ochishini bilish imkonini beradi. Masalan, .txt fayli matnli fayl bo'lib, uni bloknot yordamida ochish mumkin. .jpg fayli rasm faylidir va uni paint dasturida ochish mumkin.

definition_eng: An online magazine that is either published on the internet or delivered by email.
definition_uz: Internetda chop etiladigan yoki elektron pochta orqali yuboriladigan onlayn jurnal.

definition_eng: Short for frequently asked questions.
definition_uz: Tez-tez beriladigan savollar uchun qisqartma.

definition_eng: Keys on a keyboard that give special commands to the computer. For example you can press the F1 key to bring up a help menu. Function keys are usually at the top of the keyboard.
definition_uz: Kompyuterga maxsus buyruqlar beradigan klaviaturadagi tugmalar. Masalan, yordam menyusini ochish uchun F1 tugmasini bosishingiz mumkin. Funktsional tugmalar odatda klaviaturaning yuqori qismida joylashgan.

definition_eng: A favicon is most widely known as the icon that appears next to a bookmarked webpage in your bookmarks or *favorites* folder, thus the name of *favorites*-icon. It can also be displayed in the address bar in your browser, next to the URL of the webpage.
definition_uz: Favikon keng tarqalgan bo'lib xatcho'plaringiz yoki *sevimlilar* jildingizdagi xatcho'p qo'yilgan veb-sahifa yonida paydo bo'ladigan belgi, shuning uchun *sevimlilar*-belgichasi nomi sifatida tanilgan. Shuningdek, u brauzeringizning manzillar qatorida, veb-sahifaning URL manzili yonida ko'rsatilishi mumkin.

definition_eng: In the old days a file used to be a section category that was kept in a filing cabinet, however now we have less paper to file away. Now the term file can mean anything on your computer. Everything on your computer is made up of files. Folders and directories have files stored in them. Programs are made up of certain files that make the programs work. A file on a computer can mean any file unless you specify which type. For example there are music files, picture files, system files, and so on.
definition_uz: Qadimda fayl hujjatlar kabinetida saqlanadigan bo'lim toifasi bo'lgan, ammo hozir bizda kamroq qog'oz bor. Endi fayl atamasi kompyuteringizda hamma narsani anglatishi mumkin. Kompyuteringizdagi hamma narsa fayllardan iborat.Papkalar va kataloglarda saqlangan fayllar mavjud. Dasturlar dasturlarning ishlashini ta'minlovchi ma'lum fayllardan iborat. Kompyuterdagi fayl, qaysi turini ko'rsatmaguningizcha har qanday faylni anglatishi mumkin. Masalan, musiqa fayllari, rasm fayllari, tizim fayllari va boshqalar mavjud.

definition_eng: A file extension classifies what category a file falls into. If it has .txt as a file extension then you know it is a text file. If it has .jpeg it is a picture.
definition_uz: Fayl kengaytmasi fayl qaysi toifaga tegishli ekanligini tasniflaydi. Agar unda fayl kengaytmasi sifatida .txt bo'lsa, bu matnli fayl ekanligini bilasiz. Agar unda .jpeg bo'lsa, bu rasm.

definition_eng: The name assigned to a file.
definition_uz: Faylga tayinlangan nom.

definition_eng: File permissions are a set of rules or access rights to various types of documents, programs or areas and are applied to different user groups, the 2 user groups on a Windows Operating System are “Admin” and “Limited”, Admin has all access rights and permissions on the computer, A Limited Account has less access rights and permissions hence the term Limited some examples of these missing permissions include installing programs, some programs may not run under limited accounts.
definition_uz: Fayl ruxsatnomalari - bu har xil turdagi hujjatlar, dasturlar yoki hududlarga qoidalar yoki kirish huquqlari to'plami va turli foydalanuvchilar guruhlariga qo'llaniladi, Windows operatsion tizimidagi 2 foydalanuvchi guruhi "Admin"" va ""Cheklangan""

definition_eng: Abbreviated to FTP. This is a network protocol that states how a file can be transferred to another computer. For example you will have to use a FTP client to upload files to a web server. The files will be manipulated and standardized to be compatible with the other computer.
definition_uz: FTP uchun qisqartirilgan. Bu faylni boshqa kompyuterga qanday o'tkazish mumkinligini ko'rsatadigan tarmoq protokoli. Masalan, veb-serverga fayllarni yuklash uchun FTP mijozidan foydalanishingiz kerak bo'ladi. Fayllar boshqa kompyuter bilan mos bo'lishi uchun manipulyatsiya qilinadi va standartlashtiriladi.

definition_eng: A personal firewall is a computer program that protects your computer from malicious users by blocking incoming and outgoing unauthorized access. Windows Xp comes with a built in firewall. You can find it in the control panel under the security section.
definition_uz: Shaxsiy xavfsizlik devori - kiruvchi va chiquvchi ruxsatsiz kirishni bloklash orqali kompyuteringizni zararli foydalanuvchilardan himoya qiluvchi kompyuter dasturi. Windows Xp o'rnatilgan xavfsizlik devori bilan birga keladi. Siz uni xavfsizlik bo'limi ostidagi boshqaruv panelida topishingiz mumkin.

definition_eng: Can refer to a couple of different aspects in computing, It can refer to an Email Filter which is used to process emails and organize it to specified criteria, the most general criteria is usually to delete or send suspected spam emails to a spam folder instead of your inbox. It can also refer to an Internet Filter which is used to restrict certain content or areas on websites to certain readers an example would be where Guests can’t view profile details.
definition_uz: Hisoblashda bir nechta turli jihatlarga murojaat qilishi mumkin, u elektron pochta xabarlarini qayta ishlash va uni belgilangan mezonlarga muvofiq tartibga solish uchun foydalaniladigan Elektron pochta filtriga murojaat qilishi mumkin, eng umumiy mezonlar odatda  sizning pochta qutingizga shubhali spam xatlarni o'chirish yoki spam papkasiga yuborishdir.Shuningdek, u veb-saytlardagi ma'lum kontent yoki hududlarni ma'lum o'quvchilarga cheklash uchun foydalaniladigan Internet filtriga ham murojaat qilishi mumkin, masalan, mehmonlar profil ma'lumotlarini ko'ra olmasligi mumkin.

definition_eng: A Folder on a computer is used to store groups of files and other folders in an organized fashion, folders can be created by the user to make files easier to find similar to an alphabetized filing system in a cabinet or telephone directory.
definition_uz: Kompyuterdagi papka fayllar guruhlari va boshqa papkalarni tartibli saqlash uchun ishlatiladi, kabinet yoki telefon katalogidagi alifbo tartibidagi fayl tizimiga o'xshash fayllarni topishni osonlashtirish uchun papkalar foydalanuvchi tomonidan yaratilishi mumkin.

definition_eng: A text type that you can apply to text. For example you can make text Tahoma, 12pt, bold or maybe Arial, 10pt, italic.
definition_uz: Matnga qo'llashingiz mumkin bo'lgan matn turi. Masalan, siz Tahoma matnini 12pt, qalin yoki Arial, 10pt, kursiv qilishingiz mumkin.

definition_eng: A space at the bottom of a document where you can place text or page numbers. If your document has more than one page the footer text can be repeated on every page.
definition_uz: Matn yoki sahifa raqamlarini joylashtirishingiz mumkin bo'lgan hujjatning pastki qismidagi bo'sh joy. Agar hujjatingiz bir nechta sahifaga ega bo'lsa, pastki matn har bir sahifada takrorlanishi mumkin.

definition_eng: A footnote is a snippet of text that is placed at the side or bottom of a page and refers to a piece of text in a document. It is like adding extra notes or explanations to different areas in a document
definition_uz: Izoh - bu sahifaning yon yoki pastki qismiga joylashtirilgan va hujjatdagi matnning bir qismiga ishora qiluvchi matn parchasi. Bu hujjatning turli sohalariga qo'shimcha eslatmalar yoki tushuntirishlar qo'shishga o'xshaydi.

definition_eng: (Hard drive, re-writeable disks) to clear of all data. Clean to the original state of empty. A hard drive has to be formatted and partitioned to install an operating system. It can also mean to format text by changing the font, color and size.
definition_uz: (Qattiq disk, qayta yoziladigan disklar) barcha ma'lumotlarni o'chirish . Bo'sh asl holatiga tozalash. Operatsion tizimni o'rnatish uchun qattiq diskni formatlash va qismlarga ajratish kerak. Bu shrift, rang va o'lchamni o'zgartirish orqali matnni formatlashni ham anglatishi mumkin.

definition_eng: It can also mean to format text by changing the font, color and size.
definition_uz: Bu shrift, rang va o'lchamni o'zgartirish orqali matnni formatlashni anglatadi.

definition_eng: Forward is an option found in an e-mail client, which allows you to forward a received e-mail to another recipient
definition_uz: Yo‘naltirish – bu elektron pochta mijozida joylashgan variant bo‘lib, u qabul qilingan elektron xatni boshqa qabul qiluvchiga yo‘naltirish imkonini beradi.

definition_eng: This is a member based website, usually free to join, where people gather to chat and converse on a particular subject. Forums can be used as a very useful learning tool for most subjects as people share their knowledge and experiences with others. You can find computer help forums, money saving forums, child birth forums, and more..
definition_uz: Bu a'zolar asosidagi veb-sayt bo'lib, odatda qo'shilish bepul, u yerda odamlar ma'lum bir mavzuda suhbatlashish va muloqot qilish  uchun yig'ilishadi. Forumlardan ko'pchilik sohalar  uchun juda foydali o'rganish vositasi sifatida foydalanish mumkin, chunki odamlar o'z bilimlari va tajribalarini boshqalar bilan baham ko'rishadi. Siz kompyuter yordam forumlarini, pul tejash forumlarini, bola tug'ilishi forumlarini va boshqalarni topishingiz mumkin.

definition_eng: A form of old data storage that held data on magnetic tape. The disk was also referred to as a 3.5” floppy. This Floppy disk has since been replaced by newer storage devices such as the CD disc, DVD disc, USB stick, and more.
definition_uz: Magnit lentada ma'lumotlarni saqlaydigan eski ma'lumotlarni saqlash shakli. Disk 3,5 dyuymli floppi deb ham atalgan. Keyinchalik bu floppi disk CD disk, DVD disk, USB flesh-disk va boshqalar kabi yangi saqlash qurilmalari bilan almashtirildi.

definition_eng: Copyrighted software that is available for use without charge. It is not a trialware or shareware, it is completely free.
definition_uz: Mualliflik huquqi bilan himoyalangan dasturiy ta'minotdan bepul foydalanish mumkin. Bu sinov yoki umumiy dastur emas, u mutlaqo bepul.

definition_eng: A Gamer refers to someone who plays video games either on a computer or console it could also include board games as well.
definition_uz: Geymer deganda kompyuterda yoki konsolda video o'yinlar o'ynaydigan odam nazarda tutiladi, u stol o'yinlarini ham o'z ichiga olishi mumkin.

definition_eng: A Gaming PC is a PC specifically built to play PC Games at higher frame rates, higher resolutions and higher detail than ordinary PC’s, typically a Gaming PC will have a dedicated graphics card, quite a bit of RAM and a dual core processor at least.
definition_uz: O'yin kompyuteri - bu oddiy shaxsiy kompyuterlarga qaraganda yuqori kvadrat tezligi, yuqori piksellar soni va yuqori detallarda kompyuter o'yinlarini o'ynash uchun maxsus ishlab chiqilgan kompyuter, odatda O'yin kompyuterida maxsus grafik karta, biroz operativ xotira va kamida ikki yadroli protsessor bo'ladi.

definition_eng: 1 gigabyte = 1,000,000,000 bytes for hard drive capacity or 1 gigabyte = 1024 megabytes for computer memory and files sizes.
definition_uz: Qattiq disk hajmi uchun 1 gigabayt = 1 000 000 000 bayt yoki kompyuter xotirasi va fayllar hajmi uchun 1 gigabayt = 1024 megabayt.

definition_eng: A hardware problem much like a software bug, that causes a computer to malfunction.
definition_uz: Kompyuterning noto'g'ri ishlashiga olib keladigan dasturiy ta'minot xatosi kabi apparat muammosi.

definition_eng: The number one search engine on the planet.
definition_uz: Sayyoradagi birinchi raqamli qidiruv tizimi.

definition_eng: Usually anything that is displayed by the computer is known as a graphic display (graph because it uses a pixel graph to place colors).
definition_uz: Odatda kompyuter tomonidan ko'rsatiladigan har qanday narsa grafik displey deb nomlanadi (grafik, chunki u ranglarni joylashtirish uchun pikselli grafikdan foydalanadi).

definition_eng: Computer display device specially configured to provide enhanced performance.
definition_uz: Kengaytirilgan ishlashni ta'minlash uchun maxsus sozlangan kompyuter displey qurilmasi.

definition_eng: An add-on component that can be installed into your computer to improve or enhance graphics that you see. This facility can also be built in and is then know as onboard graphics.
definition_uz: Siz ko'rgan grafikani yaxshilash yoki yaxshilash uchun kompyuteringizga o'rnatilishi mumkin bo'lgan qo'shimcha komponent. Ushbu ob'ekt ham o'rnatilishi mumkin va keyinchalik bort grafikasi sifatida tanilgan.

definition_eng: A small piece of software needed to run both onboard graphics and a graphics card.
definition_uz: Bortli grafik va grafik kartani ishlatish uchun kichik dasturiy ta'minot..

definition_eng: A picture or image file that has been stored digitally onto your computer.
definition_uz: Kompyuteringizda raqamli ravishda saqlangan rasm yoki rasm fayli.

definition_eng: Graphical user interface. This is when a computer user presses on icons, uses menus, or other graphical features to perform commands on a computer. This is the opposite to manually typing in difficult commands.
definition_uz: Grafik foydalanuvchi interfeysi. Bu kompyuter foydalanuvchisi kompyuterda buyruqlarni bajarish uchun piktogrammalarni bosganda, menyular yoki boshqa grafik funktsiyalardan foydalanadi. Bu qiyin buyruqlarni qo'lda yozishga qarama-qarshidir.

definition_eng: The basic parts that make up your computer. The motherboard, hard drive, memory, etc.
definition_uz: Kompyuteringizni tashkil etuvchi asosiy qismlar. Anakart, qattiq disk, xotira va boshqalar.

definition_eng: A hard drive is the storage component of your computer. It is the only place you can save a file to. You can add on an external hard drive or a flash pen drive for extra space. You can buy a 500GB hard drive for around $100 dollars. See the different drives of a computer.
definition_uz: Qattiq disk kompyuteringizning xotira qismidir. Bu faylni saqlashingiz mumkin bo'lgan yagona joy. Qo'shimcha joy uchun tashqi qattiq disk yoki flesh qalam diskini qo'shishingiz mumkin. 500 Gb qattiq diskni taxminan 100 dollarga sotib olishingiz mumkin.

definition_eng: A magnetic storage device that stores large amounts of data. Otherwise known as a hard drive. A compact disc stores data by writing to the disc with lasers.
definition_uz: Katta hajmdagi ma'lumotlarni saqlaydigan magnit saqlash qurilmasi. Yana  qattiq disk sifatida tanilgan. Kompakt disk lazer yordamida diskka yozish orqali ma'lumotlarni saqlaydi

definition_eng: Repetitive information that appears at the top of every page of a document.
definition_uz: Hujjatning har bir sahifasining yuqori qismida takrorlanadigan ma'lumotlar.

definition_eng: To select something by making it blue. You can left click once on a file or left click at the start of text, holding the button in to select the text you want. After you have selected something you can copy, cut, move, delete, and more. If you right click on something that is highlighted you will see a menu.
definition_uz: Biror narsani ko'k rangga aylantirish orqali tanlash. Siz kerakli matnni tanlash uchun tugmani ushlab turgan holda faylni bir marta bosishingiz yoki matn boshida chap tugmasini bosishingiz mumkin. Biror narsani tanlaganingizdan so'ng siz nusxa ko'chirishingiz, kesishingiz, ko'chirishingiz, o'chirishingiz va boshqalarni bajarishingiz mumkin. Belgilangan narsani o'ng tugmasini bossangiz, menyuni ko'rasiz.

definition_eng: A hit in website talk is equal to one visit to a website. For example Tips4pc gets over 5,000 hits a day.
definition_uz: Veb-saytdagi i hit veb-saytga bir marta tashrif buyurishga teng. Misol uchun, Tips4pc kuniga 5000 dan ortiq hitlar oladi.

definition_eng: The main page for a Web site which is classed as the entrance to a bigger series of related web pages. For example http://www.tips4pc.com is the homepage of Tips4pc, and the gateway to over 500 more webpage’s that are within that domain.
definition_uz: Tegishli veb-sahifalarning kattaroq turkumiga kirish sifatida tasniflangan veb-sayt uchun asosiy sahifa. Masalan, http://www.tips4pc.com bu Tips4pc-ning bosh sahifasi va shu domendagi yana 500 dan ortiq veb-sahifalarga kirish eshigi.

definition_eng: (hyper text markup language) This is coding used to develop webpages. You can start from scratch, writing html or you can use a html editor like Frontpage that has a template to start with.
definition_uz: (gipermatn belgilash tili) Bu veb-sahifalarni ishlab chiqish uchun ishlatiladigan kodlash. Siz html yozishni noldan boshlashingiz mumkin yoki siz boshlash uchun shablonga ega Frontpage kabi html muharriridan foydalanishingiz mumkin.

definition_eng: A graphic symbol for an application, file or folder. There are icons that you can use to open applications on your desktop. There are also icons in your taskbar, control panel, and more..
definition_uz: Ilova, fayl yoki papka uchun grafik belgi. Ish stolida ilovalarni ochish uchun foydalanishingiz mumkin bo'lgan piktogrammalar mavjud. Vazifalar panelida, boshqaruv panelida va boshqalarda piktogramma ham mavjud.

definition_eng: In computer terms it is referring to installing a software program onto your computer.
definition_uz: Kompyuter nuqtai nazaridan, bu sizning kompyuteringizga dasturiy ta'minot dasturini o'rnatishni nazarda tutadi.

definition_eng: A unique address that each computer has. If you have a home network your modem will have an ip address, so will your router, and any computers that are attached.
definition_uz: Har bir kompyuter  ega bo'lgan noyob manzil. Agar sizda uy tarmog'ingiz bo'lsa, modemingiz IP-manziliga ega bo'ladi, shuningdek, routeringiz va ulangan kompyuterlar ham bo'ladi.

definition_eng: (Internet service provider) Your ISP is the company that supplies your internet connection to you. It could be a local phone company or even a pay tv company. You internet service provider usually sends you a bill for your internet connection.
definition_uz: (Internet xizmat ko'rsatuvchi provayder) Internet provayderingiz sizning internet ulanishingizni ta'minlovchi kompaniyadir. Bu mahalliy telefon kompaniyasi yoki hatto pullik telekompaniya bo'lishi mumkin. Internet-provayderingiz odatda internetga ulanishingiz uchun hisob-kitobni yuboradi.

definition_eng: A programming language used in creating enhanced Web pages – for example with animated graphics or drop down menus. It can be incorporated into html or other web page languages to create a desired effect.
definition_uz: Kengaytirilgan veb-sahifalarni yaratishda foydalaniladigan dasturlash tili - masalan, animatsion grafiklar yoki ochiladigan menyular bilan. Istalgan effektni yaratish uchun uni html yoki boshqa veb-sahifa tillariga kiritish mumkin.

definition_eng: A device that enables you to communicate with a computer. For example you can write a letter by pressing on the keys of a keyboard.
definition_uz: Kompyuter bilan muloqot qilish imkonini beruvchi qurilma. Masalan, klaviatura tugmachalarini bosish orqali xat yozishingiz mumkin.

definition_eng: The set of numbers on the right hand side of the keyboard.
definition_uz: Klaviaturaning o'ng tomonidagi raqamlar to'plami.

definition_eng: (Local Area Network) A group of computers that share a common connection and are usually in a small area. For example an office or home network.
definition_uz: (Mahalliy tarmoq) Umumiy ulanishga ega va odatda kichik hududda joylashgan kompyuterlar guruhi. Masalan, ofis yoki uy tarmog'i.

definition_eng: To position a page in landscape position makes the longest measurement the width and the shortest the height of the page. As opposed to portrait page layout which has the page in normal upright position.
definition_uz: Sahifani landshaft holatida joylashtirish uchun sahifaning eng uzun o'lchovi kengligi va eng qisqasi balandligi bo'ladi. Sahifani normal tik holatda bo'lgan portret sahifa tartibidan farqli o'laroq.

definition_eng: Refers to a programming language used to create programs and express algorithms on a computer operating system, examples of these include C++, HTML, Java, Javascript and PHP.
definition_uz: Kompyuter operatsion tizimida dasturlar yaratish va algoritmlarni ifodalash uchun foydalaniladigan dasturlash tiliga ishora qiladi, bunga misollar C++, HTML, Java, Javascript va PHP tillarini o'z ichiga oladi.

definition_eng: To press on the left mouse button once. To double click is to press on the left mouse button twice.
definition_uz: Sichqonchaning chap tugmachasini bir marta bosish . Ikki marta bosish sichqonchaning chap tugmachasini ikki marta bosishdir.

definition_eng: Liquid crystal display. A type of monitor that was originally developed for laptop computers, however now is used for all modern monitors and TV’s.
definition_uz: Suyuq kristalli displey. Dastlab noutbuklar uchun ishlab chiqilgan monitor turi, ammo hozir barcha zamonaviy monitorlar va televizorlar uchun ishlatiladi.

definition_eng: The space or set measurement that is between two lines of text. For example the space between these lines you are reading now.
definition_uz: Matnning ikki qatori orasidagi bo'shliq yoki to'plam o'lchovi. Masalan, siz hozir o'qiyotgan ushbu satrlar orasidagi bo'shliq.

definition_eng: This is the shortened term for “Hyperlinks” which refers to a website or webpage reference to show information about something.
definition_uz: Bu "Giperhavolalar"" uchun qisqartirilgan atama bo'lib

definition_eng: This can also be named log out, referring to the opposite of log on. To exit and sign out. To log off out of your user account.
definition_uz: Bu tizimga kirishning teskarisiga ishora qilib, tizimdan chiqish deb  nomlanadi. Chiqish va tizimdan chiqish uchun. Foydalanuvchi hisobingizdan chiqish uchun.

definition_eng: Log On refers to a user logging on or signing in to a computer system or website account, it is a form of security measure where the user is identified by a username and password, it is used so the user can obtain access to the system.
definition_uz: Tizimga kirish foydalanuvchining kompyuter tizimiga yoki veb-sayt hisobiga kirganini bildiradi, bu foydalanuvchi nomi va parol bilan identifikatsiyalangan xavfsizlik chorasi shakli bo'lib, foydalanuvchi tizimga kirish huquqiga ega bo'lishi uchun foydalaniladi.

definition_eng: A macro is a stored set of keystrokes or commands that will enable the user to save and repeat common tasks. For example you can a macro in Microsoft word. When a macro is added to a document it carries out the set of instructions.
definition_uz: Makro - bu foydalanuvchiga umumiy vazifalarni saqlash va takrorlash imkonini beradigan saqlangan tugmalar yoki buyruqlar to'plami. Masalan, siz Microsoft Word-da makro yaratishingiz mumkin. Hujjatga makro qo'shilsa, u ko'rsatmalar to'plamini bajaradi.

definition_eng: A mail bomb is an onslaught of email messages that are intended to overload a recipient’s inbox.
definition_uz: Pochta bombasi - bu qabul qiluvchining kirish qutisini ortiqcha yuklash uchun mo'ljallangan elektron pochta xabarlarining hujumi.

definition_eng: A list of email addresses collected with a particular topic in common. People on the mailing list will receive updates and information about that topic. For example Tips4pc.com has a newsletter mailing list.
definition_uz: Muayyan mavzudagi umumiy elektron pochta manzillari ro'yxati. Pochta ro'yxatidagi odamlar ushbu mavzu bo'yicha yangilanishlar va ma'lumotlarni olishadi. Masalan, Tips4pc.com saytida axborot byulletenlarini yuborish ro'yxati mavjud.

definition_eng: Rules that you can set in Outlook Express to filter your email messages.
definition_uz: Elektron pochta xabarlaringizni filtrlash uchun Outlook Express-da o'rnatishingiz mumkin bo'lgan qoidalar.

definition_eng: The central circuit board that provides electrical connections so the other components of a computer can communicate with each other. It is the main part to a computer. Everything is connected to it.
definition_uz: Kompyuterning boshqa komponentlari bir-biri bilan bog'lanishi uchun elektr ulanishlarini ta'minlaydigan markaziy elektron plata. Bu kompyuterning asosiy qismidir. Hamma narsa unga bog'langan.

definition_eng: The screen you view your running computer on. This is where you will see the login screen and the desktop.
definition_uz: Ishlayotgan kompyuteringizda ko'rayotgan ekran. Bu yerda siz kirish ekrani va ish stolini ko'rasiz.

definition_eng: Media Devices are a general term for an electronic device which stores and plays Music, Photos or Videos, Media Devices are normally connected to a computer for Music, Photo and Video Files to be transferred to the device, although some media devices like an iPhone and other Smart Phones include Internet Access for an Application Store or Media Store which allows files to be transferred directly to the device.
definition_uz: Media qurilmalari musiqa, fotosuratlar yoki videolarni saqlaydigan va ijro etuvchi elektron qurilma uchun umumiy atama bo?lib, musiqa, foto va video fayllarni qurilmaga o?tkazish uchun media qurilmalar odatda kompyuterga ulanadi,  iPhone kabi ba?zi media qurilmalari va boshqa Smart Telefonlar ilovalar do'koni yoki Media do'koni uchun Internetga kirishni o'z ichiga oladi, bu esa fayllarni to'g'ridan-to'g'ri qurilmaga o'tkazish imkonini beradi.

definition_eng: Can refer to a few things including a Media Device which stores and plays media files like Music and Videos (explained more above), and Media Player software which will organize, hold and play media files on a computer some of the main ones are Windows Media Player which is preloaded on Windows Systems and QuickTime Player which is preloaded on Mac OS Systems.
definition_uz: Musiqa va videolar kabi media fayllarni saqlaydigan va ijro etuvchi Media qurilmasi  va media fayllarni kompyuterda tartibga soluvchi, saqlaydigan va o?ynatadigan Media Player dasturi kabi bir nechta narsalarga murojaat qilishi mumkin. Windows tizimlarida oldindan yuklangan pleyer va Mac OS tizimlarida oldindan yuklangan QuickTime Player.

definition_eng: This is a device which modulates an analogue carrier signal to encode digital information and can demodulate a carrier signal as well to decode the information, so it allows for the transfer of digital data across phone lines where if the digital data was kept in its original format it could not be transferred across the phone lines.
definition_uz: Bu raqamli ma'lumotni kodlash uchun analog tashuvchi signalni modulyatsiya qiluvchi qurilma va ma'lumotni dekodlash uchun tashuvchi signalini demodulyatsiya qilishi mumkin, shuning uchun raqamli ma'lumotlar asl formatida saqlangan bo'lsa, telefon liniyalari bo'ylab raqamli ma'lumotlarni uzatish imkonini beradi. uni telefon liniyalari bo'ylab uzatish mumkin emas edi.

definition_eng: Microsoft Disk Operating System. Ms-dos is the original operating system. Although it looked nothing like windows as it was text based and all commands had to be typed in. You had to know the basic command lines and language to do this.
definition_uz: Microsoft Disk operatsion tizimi. Ms-dos - bu asl operatsion tizim. Garchi u matnga asoslangan va barcha buyruqlar kiritilishi kerak bo'lganligi sababli u hech qanday oynaga o'xshamasdi. Buning uchun asosiy buyruq qatorlari va tilni bilishingiz kerak edi.

definition_eng:
Information that is presented using more than one media type. For example a program might contain video, sound, graphics, and text. Training CD’s can be multimedia by incorporating voice, video, and text tutorials.
Multimedia computer: This is a computer equipped to handle multimedia applications and programs. For example the computer should have a graphics accelerator, a sound card, speakers, and anything else that helps enhance the multimedia experience.
definition_uz:
Bir nechta media turlaridan foydalangan holda taqdim etilgan ma'lumotlar. Masalan, dasturda video, ovoz, grafik va matn bo'lishi mumkin. O'quv kompakt disklari ovozli, video va matnli darsliklarni o'z ichiga olgan multimedia bo'lishi mumkin.
Multimediali kompyuter: Bu multimedia ilovalari va dasturlarini boshqarish uchun jihozlangan kompyuter. Masalan, kompyuterda grafik tezlatkich, ovoz kartasi, dinamiklar va multimedia tajribasini yaxshilashga yordam beradigan boshqa narsalar bo'lishi kerak.

definition_eng: Accuracy is an important factor in assessing the success of data mining. When applied to data, accuracy refers to the rate of correct values in the data. When applied to models, accuracy refers to the degree of fit between the model and the data. This measures how error-free the model’s predictions are. Since accuracy does not include cost information, it is possible for a less accurate model to be more cost-effective.
definition_uz: Aniqlik ma'lumotlarni -berilganlarni intellektual tahlil qilishmuvaffaqiyatini baholashda muhim omil hisoblanadi. Ma'lumotlarga qo'llanilganda, aniqlik ma'lumotlardagi to'g'ri qiymatlar tezligini anglatadi. Modellarga qo'llanilganda, aniqlik model va ma'lumotlar o'rtasidagi moslik darajasini bildiradi.
