Normalizatsiya barcha so'zlarni teng asosga qo'yadi va qayta ishlashni bir xilda davom ettirishga imkon beradi.

definition_eng:
Stemming is the process of eliminating affixes (suffixed, prefixes, infixes, circumfixes) from a word in order to obtain a word stem.
running ? run
definition_uz:
O?zaklash - so?z o?zagini olish uchun so?zdan affikslarni (qo?shimchalar, old qo?shimchalar, infikslar, aylanmalar) chiqarib tashlash jarayonidir.
yugurish ? yugur

definition_eng: In linguistics and NLP, corpus (literally Latin for body) refers to a collection of texts. Such collections may be formed of a single language of texts, or can span multiple languages -- there are numerous reasons for which multilingual corpora (the plural of corpus) may be useful. Corpora may also consist of themed texts (historical, Biblical, etc.). Corpora are generally solely used for statistical linguistic analysis and hypothesis testing.
definition_uz: Tilshunoslikda va NLPda korpus (so'zma-so'z lotincha tanani anglatadi) matnlar to'plamini anglatadi. Bunday to'plamlar matnlarning bir tilidan tuzilishi yoki bir nechta tillarni qamrab olishi mumkin -- ko'p tilli korpus (korpusning ko'pligi) foydali bo'lishi mumkin bo'lgan ko'plab sabablar mavjud. Korpora shuningdek, mavzuli matnlardan (tarixiy, Injil va boshqalar) iborat bo'lishi mumkin. Korpora odatda faqat statistik lingvistik tahlil va gipotezani tekshirish uchun ishlatiladi.

definition_eng: Stop words are those words which are filtered out before further processing of text, since these words contribute little to overall meaning, given that they are generally the most common words in a language. For instance, "the
definition_uz: and ""a

definition_eng: POS tagging consists of assigning a category tag to the tokenized parts of a sentence. The most popular POS tagging would be identifying words as nouns, verbs, adjectives, etc.
definition_uz: POS teglari gapning tokenlangan qismlariga toifa tegini belgilashdan iborat. Eng mashhur POS teglari so'zlarni otlar, fe'llar, sifatlar va boshqalar sifatida aniqlashdir.

definition_eng: Statistical Language Modeling is the process of building a statistical language model which is meant to provide an estimate of a natural language. For a sequence of input words, the model would assign a probability to the entire sequence, which contributes to the estimated likelihood of various possible sequences. This can be especially useful for NLP applications which generate text.
definition_uz: Tilni statistik modellashtirish - bu tabiiy tilni baholashni ta'minlash uchun mo'ljallangan statistik til modelini yaratish jarayoni. Kirish so'zlari ketma-ketligi uchun model butun ketma-ketlikka ehtimollikni tayinlaydi, bu turli xil mumkin bo'lgan ketma-ketliklarning taxminiy ehtimoliga hissa qo'shadi. Bu, ayniqsa, matn yaratadigan NLP ilovalari uchun foydali bo'lishi mumkin.

definition_eng:
Bag of words is a particular representation model used to simplify the contents of a selection of text. The bag of words model omits grammar and word order, but is interested in the number of occurrences of words within the text. The ultimate representation of the text selection is that of a bag of words (bag referring to the set theory concept of multisets, which differ from simple sets).
Actual storage mechanisms for the bag of words representation can vary, but the following is a simple example using a dictionary for intuitiveness.
Bag of words is a particular representation model used to simplify the contents of a selection of text. The bag of words model omits grammar and word order, but is interested in the number of occurrences of words within the text. The ultimate representation of the text selection is that of a bag of words (bag referring to the set theory concept of multisets, which differ from simple sets).
Actual storage mechanisms for the bag of words representation can vary, but the following is a simple example using a dictionary for intuitiveness.
definition_uz: So'zlar sumkasi - bu tanlangan matn mazmunini soddalashtirish uchun ishlatiladigan maxsus tasvirlash modeli. So'zlar sumkasi modeli grammatika va so'z tartibini o'tkazib yuboradi, lekin matn ichidagi so'zlarning soni bilan qiziqadi. Matnni tanlashning yakuniy ifodasi so'zlar sumkasi (xalta oddiy to'plamlardan farq qiladigan multisetlarning to'plam nazariyasi kontseptsiyasiga ishora qiladi).

definition_eng: n-grams is another representation model for simplifying text selection contents. As opposed to the orderless representation of bag of words, n-grams modeling is interested in preserving contiguous sequences of N items from the text selection.
definition_uz: n-gramm matn tanlash tarkibini soddalashtirish uchun yana bir vakillik modelidir. So'zlar to'plamining tartibsiz ifodalanishidan farqli o'laroq, n-gramm modellashtirish matn tanlovidan N elementning ketma-ketligini saqlab qolishdan manfaatdor.

definition_eng: Regular expressions, often abbreviated regexp or regexp, are a tried and true method of concisely describing patterns of text. A regular expression is represented as a special text string itself, and is meant for developing search patterns on selections of text.
definition_uz: Muntazam iboralar, ko'pincha regexp deb qisqartiriladi, matn ma'lumotlarini  qisqacha tavsiflashning sinab ko'rilgan va haqiqiy usulidir.Muntazam iboraning o'zi maxsus matn qatori sifatida ifodalanadi va matn tanlash bo'yicha qidiruv ma'lumotlarini ishlab chiqish uchun mo'ljallangan.

definition_eng:
Zipf's Law is used to describe the relationship between word frequencies in document collections. If a document collection's words are ordered by frequency, and y is used to describe the number of times that the xth word appears, Zipf's observation is concisely captured as y = cx-1/2 (item frequency is inversely proportional to item rank). More generally, Wikipedia says:
Zipf's law states that given some corpus of natural language utterances, the frequency of any word is inversely proportional to its rank in the frequency table. Thus the most frequent word will occur approximately twice as often as the second most frequent word, three times as often as the third most frequent word, etc.
definition_uz:
Zipf qonuni hujjatlar to'plamidagi so'z chastotalari o'rtasidagi munosabatni tavsiflash uchun ishlatiladi.Agar hujjatlar to'plamining so'zlari chastota bo'yicha tartiblangan bo'lsa va y x-chi so'zning paydo bo'lish sonini tavsiflash uchun ishlatilsa, Zipf kuzatuvi y = cx-1/2 (modda chastotasi element darajasiga teskari proportsional) sifatida qisqacha yoziladi.Umuman olganda, Vikipediya shunday deydi:
Zipf qonunida aytilishicha, tabiiy tildagi ba'zi so'z birikmalarini hisobga olgan holda, har qanday so'zning chastotasi chastotalar jadvalidagi darajasiga teskari proportsionaldir.Shunday qilib, eng tez-tez uchraydigan so'z ikkinchi eng tez-tez uchraydigan so'zdan taxminan ikki marta, uchinchi eng tez-tez uchraydigan so'zdan uch marta tez-tez uchraydi va hokazo.

definition_eng: Also referred to as parsing, syntactic analysis is the task of analyzing strings as symbols, and ensuring their conformance to a established set of grammatical rules. This step must, out of necessity, come before any further analysis which attempts to extract insight from text -- semantic, sentiment, etc. -- treating it as something beyond symbols.
definition_uz: Parsing, shuningdek, tahlil qilish deb ataladi, bu satrlarni belgilar sifatida tahlil qilish va ularni grammatika qoidalari to'plamiga moslashtirish vazifasidir.Bu qadam zaruratdan kelib chiqib, matndan ma?no, his-tuyg?u va h.k.lardan tushuncha olishga harakat qiladigan har qanday keyingi tahlildan oldin bo?lishi kerak.

definition_eng: Also known as meaning generation, semantic analysis is interested in determining the meaning of text selections (either character or word sequences). After an input selection of text is read and parsed (analyzed syntactically), the text selection can then be interpreted for meaning. Simply put, syntactic analysis is concerned with what words a text selection was made up of, while semantic analysis wants to know what the collection of words actually means.
definition_uz: Ma'noni yaratish deb ham ataladigan semantik tahlil matn tanlashning ma'nosini (belgi yoki so'z ketma-ketligi) aniqlashdan manfaatdor.Matnning kirish tanlovi o'qilgan va tahlil qilingandan so'ng (sintaktik tahlil qilingandan so'ng), matn tanlovi ma'nosi uchun talqin qilinishi mumkin. Oddiy qilib aytganda, sintaktik tahlil matn tanlovi qaysi so'zlardan tuzilganligi bilan bog'liq bo'lsa, semantik tahlil esa so'zlar to'plami nimani anglatishini bilishni xohlaydi.

definition_eng: Sentiment analysis is the process of evaluating and determining the sentiment captured in a selection of text, with sentiment defined as feeling or emotion. This sentiment can be simply positive (happy), negative (sad or angry), or neutral, or can be some more precise measurement along a scale, with neutral in the middle, and positive and negative increasing in either direction.
definition_uz: Tuyg'ularni tahlil qilish - bu tuyg'u yoki his-tuyg'u sifatida belgilangan tuyg'u bilan tanlangan matnda olingan his-tuyg'ularni baholash va aniqlash jarayoni.Bu his-tuyg'u shunchaki ijobiy (baxtli), salbiy (qayg'uli yoki g'azablangan) yoki neytral bo'lishi mumkin yoki shkala bo'yicha aniqroq o'lchov bo'lishi mumkin, o'rtada neytral va har ikki yo'nalishda ijobiy va salbiy ortib boradi.

definition_eng: Information retrieval is the process of accessing and retrieving the most appropriate information from text based on a particular query, using context-based indexing or metadata.. One of the most famous examples of information retrieval would be Google Search.
definition_uz: Axborotni qidirish - bu kontekstga asoslangan indekslash yoki metama'lumotlardan foydalangan holda ma'lum bir so'rov asosida matndan eng mos ma'lumotlarga kirish va olish jarayoni.Ma'lumot olishning eng mashhur misollaridan biri Google Qidiruv bo'la oladi.

definition_eng: Provides the final certification that the system is ready to be used in a production setting.
definition_uz: Tizim ishlab chiqarish sharoitida foydalanishga tayyorligini yakuniy sertifikatlashni ta'minlaydi.

definition_eng: Policies and procedures to prevent improper access to systems.
definition_uz: Tizimlarga noto'g'ri kirishni oldini olish uchun siyosat va tartiblar.

definition_eng: The mechanisms for assessing responsibility for decisions made and actions taken.
definition_uz: Qabul qilingan qarorlar va qabul qilingan harakatlar uchun javobgarlikni baholash mexanizmlari.

definition_eng: Model for identifying all the company activities that cause costs to occur while producing a specific product or service so that managers can see which products or services are profitable or losing money and make changes to maximize firm profitability.
definition_uz: Muayyan mahsulot yoki xizmatni ishlab chiqarishda xarajatlarni keltirib chiqaradigan kompaniyaning barcha faoliyatini aniqlash uchun model, shunda menejerlar qaysi mahsulot yoki xizmatlar foydali yoki pul yo'qotayotganini ko'rishlari va firma rentabelligini maksimal darajada oshirish uchun o'zgartirishlar kiritishlari mumkin.

definition_eng: A powerful programming language with tight control and efficiency of execution; is portable across different microprocessors and is used primarily with PCs.
definition_uz: Qattiq nazorat va ijro samaradorligi bilan kuchli dasturlash tili; turli mikroprotsessorlar orqali portativ bo'lib, asosan shaxsiy kompyuterlarda qo'llaniladi.

definition_eng: Object-oriented version of the C programming language.
definition_uz: C dasturlash tilining ob'ektga yo'naltirilgan versiyasi.

definition_eng: An organizational department responsible for handling customer service issues by telephone and other channels.
definition_uz: Telefon va boshqa kanallar orqali mijozlarga xizmat ko'rsatish masalalarini hal qilish uchun mas'ul bo'lgan tashkiliy bo'lim.

definition_eng: The process of predicting when a computer hardware system becomes saturated to ensure that adequate computing resources are available for work of different priorities and that the firm has enough computing power for its current and future needs.
definition_uz: Turli xil ustuvorlikdagi ish uchun yetarli hisoblash resurslari mavjudligini va firmaning joriy va kelajakdagi ehtiyojlari uchun yetarli hisoblash quvvatiga ega bo'lishini ta'minlash uchun kompyuterning apparat tizimi qachon yetarli bo'lishini  bashorat qilish jarayoni.

definition_eng: The link by which data or voice are transmitted between sending and receiving devices in a network.
definition_uz: Tarmoqdagi jo'natuvchi va qabul qiluvchi qurilmalar o'rtasida ma'lumotlar yoki ovoz uzatiladigan havola.

definition_eng: Live, interactive conversations over a public network.
definition_uz: Umumiy tarmoq orqali jonli, interaktiv suhbatlar.

definition_eng: A statutory grant that protects creators of intellectual property against copying by others for any purpose for a minimum of 70 years.
definition_uz: Intellektual mulk yaratuvchilarni har qanday maqsadda boshqalar tomonidan nusxa ko'chirishdan kamida 70 yil davomida himoya qiluvchi qonuniy grant.

definition_eng: A small data warehouse containing only a portion of the organization's data for a specified function or population of users.
definition_uz: Ma'lum bir funktsiya yoki foydalanuvchilar soni uchun tashkilot ma'lumotlarining faqat bir qismini o'z ichiga olgan kichik ma'lumotlar ombori.

definition_eng: A Wide Area Network (WAN) is a computer network that covers a large geographical area, e.g. police forces.
definition_uz: Keng hududiy tarmoq (WAN) - bu katta geografik hududni qamrab oluvchi kompyuter tarmog'i, masalan. politsiya kuchlari.

definition_eng: The World Wide Web is the name given to the network of interlinked online content, such as HTML web pages, images and video.
definition_uz: World Wide Web - bu HTML veb-sahifalari, tasvirlar va videolar kabi bir-biriga bog'langan onlayn kontent tarmog'iga berilgan nom.

definition_eng: Storage / memory where data is lost when power is removed.
definition_uz: Quvvat o'chirilganda ma'lumotlar yo'qoladigan  xotira.

definition_eng: Virtual memory is created when a computer temporarily uses secondary storage (a hard disk) to act as RAM.
definition_uz: Virtual xotira kompyuter operativ xotira vazifasini bajarish uchun vaqtincha ikkilamchi xotiradan (qattiq disk) foydalanganda yaratiladi.

definition_eng: A trackball is an input device used to control a pointer/cursor. Unlike a mouse, the device stays stationary whilst the user moves the ball within its socket
definition_uz: Trekbol - bu ko'rsatgich/kursorni boshqarish uchun ishlatiladigan kiritish qurilmasi. Sichqonchadan farqli o'laroq, foydalanuvchi to'pni rozetka ichida harakatlantirganda qurilma harakatsiz qoladi

definition_eng: A QR code is a computer generated pattern capable of holding a modest amount of data.  This data is accessed when the QR code is read by a QR scanner.
definition_uz: QR-kod - bu kam miqdordagi ma'lumotlarni saqlashga qodir bo'lgan kompyuter tomonidan yaratilgan naqsh. QR-kod QR skaneri tomonidan o'qilganda ushbu ma'lumotlarga kirish mumkin.

definition_eng: Phishing is the attempt to trick people into giving away sensitive information to fraudsters via fake emails containing bogus links.
definition_uz: Fishing - bu soxta havolalarni o'z ichiga olgan soxta elektron pochta orqali firibgarlarga maxfiy ma'lumotlarni berish uchun odamlarni aldashga urinish.

definition_eng: A Media Access Control address (MAC address) is a unique number given to every device that connects to the internet or a network.  It identifies the actual device.
definition_uz: Media kirishni boshqarish manzili (MAC manzili) internetga yoki tarmoqqa ulangan har bir qurilmaga beriladigan noyob raqamdir. U haqiqiy qurilmani aniqlaydi.

definition_eng: Indexing information providing an online directory of services on a network. In contrast, the information of the white pages provides an online index of users on a network. In both cases the services or users indexed will normally be those of local interest, typically those on a local area network
definition_uz: Tarmoqdagi xizmatlarning onlayn katalogini taqdim etuvchi ma'lumotni indekslash. Aksincha, oq sahifalar ma'lumotlari tarmoqdagi foydalanuvchilarning onlayn indeksini taqdim etadi. Ikkala holatda ham indekslangan xizmatlar yoki foydalanuvchilar odatda mahalliy tarmoqdagilar manfaatlarga ega bo'ladi.

definition_eng: Adaptive technology is a set of tools or products created to help people with disabilities in order for them to work efficiently and productively.  It is related to assistive technology, which consists of products and services that would allow people with disabilities to use existing technology to accomplish tasks.
definition_uz: Moslashuvchan texnologiya - bu nogironlarning samarali va samarali ishlashiga yordam berish uchun yaratilgan vositalar yoki mahsulotlar to'plami. Bu nogironlarga mavjud texnologiyalardan vazifalarni bajarish uchun foydalanish imkonini beradigan mahsulot va xizmatlardan iborat yordamchi texnologiyalar bilan bog'liq.

definition_eng: Agile development is a set of processes for creating software that includes being creative and flexible in software development. This means that the code is kept simple, is tested often, and, instead of waiting for everything to be finished, incremental but functional parts of the software are released as soon as they are ready. These modules are functional and will be able to help users do some work.
definition_uz: Tezkor rivojlanish - dasturiy ta'minotni yaratishda ijodiy va moslashuvchanlikni o'z ichiga olgan dasturiy ta'minotni yaratish jarayonlari to'plami. Bu shuni anglatadiki, kod oddiy saqlanadi, tez-tez tekshiriladi va hamma narsa tugashini kutish o'rniga, dasturiy ta'minotning qo'shimcha, lekin funktsional qismlari tayyor bo'lishi bilanoq chiqariladi. Ushbu modullar funktsionaldir va foydalanuvchilarga ba'zi ishlarni bajarishga yordam beradi.

definition_eng: Big data describes the phenomenal growth, use, and accessibility of information. This comes from a lot of sources such as social media updates, search data, multimedia content, and even climate information, among others.  As such, it could be structured or unstructured. Big data could also mean the rise of new tools to analyze all the data available to you.
definition_uz: Katta ma'lumotlar ma'lumotlarning ajoyib o'sishi, ishlatilishi va foydalanish imkoniyatini tavsiflaydi. Bu ijtimoiy media yangilanishlari, qidiruv ma'lumotlari, multimedia kontenti va hatto iqlim ma'lumotlari kabi ko'plab manbalardan keladi. Shunday qilib, u tuzilgan yoki tuzilmagan bo'lishi mumkin. Katta ma'lumotlar sizga mavjud bo'lgan barcha ma'lumotlarni tahlil qilish uchun yangi vositalarning paydo bo'lishini ham anglatishi mumkin.

definition_eng: One of the most important IT terms, business intelligence refers to an array of software and tools that businesses can use to analyze raw data. It includes data mining, analysis, and reporting.
definition_uz: Eng muhim IT atamalaridan biri bo'lgan biznes razvedkasi korxonalar xom ma'lumotlarni tahlil qilish uchun foydalanishi mumkin bo'lgan bir qator dasturiy ta'minot va vositalarni anglatadi. U ma'lumotlarni qidirish, tahlil qilish va hisobot berishni o'z ichiga oladi.

definition_eng: A device, typically attached to a private branch exchange or voice mail system, that answers incoming calls.
definition_uz: Odatda xususiy filial almashinuvi yoki ovozli pochta tizimiga biriktirilgan, kiruvchi qo'ng'iroqlarga javob beradigan qurilma.

definition_eng: A technology that enables a program that uses processor features of a given system model to continue to work correctly when the program is moved to another system model that does not have all the processor features of the original model.
definition_uz: Berilgan tizim modelining protsessor xususiyatlaridan foydalanadigan dasturni asl modeldagi barcha protsessor xususiyatlariga ega bo?lmagan boshqa tizim modeliga o?tkazilganda to?g?ri ishlashni davom ettirish imkonini beruvchi texnologiya.

definition_eng: A feature that determines link options and optimal settings for a given Ethernet connection. When AUTONEG is enabled, a network interface card or a switch port can determine the capabilities of the device at the far end of the link and select the best mode of operation.
definition_uz: Berilgan Ethernet ulanishi uchun ulanish variantlari va optimal sozlamalarni aniqlaydigan xususiyat. AUTONEG yoqilganda, tarmoq interfeysi kartasi yoki kommutator porti havolaning eng chetida joylashgan qurilmaning imkoniyatlarini aniqlashi va eng yaxshi ish rejimini tanlashi mumkin.

definition_eng: Atom is an alternate XML format for easily sharing content, much like RSS Really Simple Syndication (format). Blogs on http://www.blogger.com/ for example, publish Atom feeds.
definition_uz: Atom - bu RSS Really Simple Syndication (format) kabi tarkibni osongina almashish uchun muqobil XML formati. http://www.blogger.com/ saytidagi bloglar, masalan, Atom tasmalarini nashr etish.

definition_eng: Bits Per Second.In data communications, bits per second (abbreviated bps) is a common measure of data speed for computer modems and transmission carriers.
definition_uz: Ma'lumot uzatishda soniyada bit (qisqartirilgan bps) kompyuter modemlari va uzatish tashuvchilari uchun ma'lumotlar tezligining umumiy o'lchovidir.

definition_eng: The terrestrial link between an earth station and a switching or data center.
definition_uz: Yer stansiyasi va kommutatsiya yoki ma'lumotlar markazi o'rtasidagi er usti aloqasi.

definition_eng: An option in most e-mail programs, it allows you to send duplicate copies of an e-mail message. When you type a recipient's e-mail address in the cc field, it is viewable to everyone who receives the e-mail message .
definition_uz: Ko'pgina elektron pochta dasturlarida mavjud bo'lgan variant, u sizga elektron pochta xabarlarining ikki nusxasini yuborish imkonini beradi. Qabul qiluvchining elektron pochta manzilini cc maydoniga kiritganingizda, uni elektron pochta xabarini olgan har bir kishi ko'rishi mumkin.

definition_eng: Graphics created using computers and, more generally, the representation and manipulation of pictorial data by a computer.
definition_uz: Kompyuterlar yordamida yaratilgan grafikalar va umuman olganda, tasviriy ma'lumotlarni kompyuter tomonidan tasvirlash va manipulyatsiya qilish.

definition_eng: A control character used in the ASCII code set to request identification status.
definition_uz: ASCII kodida identifikatsiya holatini so'rash uchun ishlatiladigan boshqaruv belgisi.

definition_eng: Searching through the Google search engine
definition_uz: Google qidiruv tizimi orqali qidirish

definition_eng: Software tools and technology to support groups of people working together on a project, often at different site
definition_uz:
Ko'pincha turli saytlarda loyihada birgalikda ishlaydigan odamlar guruhlarini qo'llab-quvvatlash uchun dasturiy vositalar va texnologiya
Bu manba matni haqida batafsilQo?shimcha axborot olish uchun manba matnini kiriting
Fikr-mulohaza
Yon panellar

definition_eng: A scrambled, or encrypted, form of a password or other text.
definition_uz: Parol yoki boshqa matnning shifrlangan yoki shifrlangan shakli.

definition_eng: Generally, a term used to describe a device that serves as the center of a star-topology network
definition_uz: Umuman olganda, bu atama yulduz topologiyasi tarmog'ining markazi bo'lib xizmat qiladigan qurilmani tasvirlash uchun ishlatiladi

definition_eng: A form of control software layer that enables multiple operating systems to run on the same physical hardware. The oldest hypervisor is IBM's VM — but this only runs on S/370-style hardware (where it hosted MVS, VSE, and other operating systems).
definition_uz: Bir nechta operatsion tizimlarning bir xil jismoniy uskunada ishlashini ta'minlaydigan boshqaruvchi dasturiy ta'minot qatlamining shakli. Eng qadimgi gipervisor IBM’ning VM’idir — lekin bu faqat S/370 uslubidagi apparatda ishlaydi (u yerda MVS, VSE va boshqa operatsion tizimlar joylashgan).

definition_eng: Big Data Scientist is a person who can take structured and unstructured data points and use his formidable skills in statistics, maths, and programming to organize them. He applies all his analytical power such as contextual understanding, industry knowledge, and understanding of existing assumptions to uncover the hidden solutions for business development.
definition_uz: Big Data Scientist - bu tuzilgan va tuzilmagan ma'lumotlar nuqtalarini oladigan va ularni tartibga solish uchun statistika, matematika va dasturlash bo'yicha o'zining ajoyib mahoratidan foydalanadigan odam. U biznesni rivojlantirish uchun yashirin echimlarni ochish uchun kontekstni tushunish, sanoat bilimlari va mavjud taxminlarni tushunish kabi barcha analitik kuchlarini qo'llaydi.

definition_eng: Metadata is data that describes other data. Metadata summarizes basic information about data, which can make finding and working with particular instances of data easier. For example, author, date created and date modified and file size are very basic document metadata. In addition to document files, metadata is used for images, videos, spreadsheets and web pages.
definition_uz: Metama'lumotlar - bu boshqa ma'lumotlarni tavsiflovchi ma'lumotlar. Metadata ma'lumotlar haqidagi asosiy ma'lumotlarni jamlaydi, bu ma'lumotlarning alohida misollarini topish va ular bilan ishlashni osonlashtiradi. Misol uchun, muallif, yaratilgan sana va o'zgartirilgan sana va fayl hajmi juda asosiy hujjat metama'lumotlaridir. Hujjat fayllari bilan bir qatorda, metama'lumotlar rasmlar, videolar, elektron jadvallar va veb-sahifalar uchun ishlatiladi

definition_eng: A technology that superimposes a computer-generated image on a user's view of the real world, thus providing a composite view.
definition_uz: Kompyuterda yaratilgan tasvirni foydalanuvchining real dunyo ko‘rinishiga qo‘shib, kompozitsion ko‘rinishni ta’minlaydigan texnologiya.

definition_eng: An N-gram in which N=2.
definition_uz: N=2 bo'lgan N-gram.

definition_eng: The vector of partial derivatives with respect to all of the independent variables. In machine learning, the gradient is the vector of partial derivatives of the model function. The gradient points in the direction of steepest ascent.
definition_uz: Barcha mustaqil o'zgaruvchilarga nisbatan qisman hosilalarning vektori. Mashinani o'rganishda gradient model funktsiyasining qisman hosilalari vektori hisoblanadi. Gradient eng tik ko'tarilish yo'nalishiga ishora qiladi.

definition_eng: The production of plausible-seeming but factually incorrect output by a generative model that purports to be making an assertion about the real world. For example, if a dialog agent claims that Barack Obama died in 1865, the agent is hallucinating.
definition_uz: Haqiqiy dunyoni tasdiqlovchi generativ model tomonidan aqlga sig'adigan, lekin haqiqatan ham noto'g'ri mahsulot ishlab chiqarish. Misol uchun, agar dialog agenti Barak Obama 1865 yilda vafot etgan deb da'vo qilsa, agent gallyutsinatsiya ko'radi.

definition_eng:
A popular clustering algorithm that groups examples in unsupervised learning. The k-means algorithm basically does the following:

Iteratively determines the best k center points (known as centroids).
Assigns each example to the closest centroid. Those examples nearest the same centroid belong to the same group.
The k-means algorithm picks centroid locations to minimize the cumulative square of the distances from each example to its closest centroid.
definition_uz:
Nazoratsiz o?rganishdagi misollarni guruhlarga birlashtiruvchi mashhur klaster algoritmi. k-means algoritmi asosan quyidagilarni amalga oshiradi:
Iterativ ravishda eng yaxshi k markaz nuqtalarini aniqlaydi (tsentroidlar deb nomlanadi).
Har bir misolni eng yaqin markazga tayinlaydi. Xuddi shu markazga eng yaqin bo'lgan misollar bir xil guruhga tegishli.
K-means algoritmi har bir misoldan eng yaqin markazgacha bo'lgan masofalarning yig'indisi kvadratini minimallashtirish uchun markazlashtirilgan joylarni tanlaydi.

definition_eng: A graph representing the decision-making model where decisions (or actions) are taken to navigate a sequence of states under the assumption that the Markov property holds.
definition_uz: Markov mulkiga ega bo'lgan holatlar ketma-ketligini boshqarish uchun qarorlar (yoki harakatlar) qabul qilinadigan qaror qabul qilish modelini ifodalovchi grafik.

definition_eng: A feature whose values change across one or more dimensions, usually time. For example, the number of swimsuits sold at a particular store demonstrates nonstationarity because that number varies with the season. As a second example, the quantity of a particular fruit harvested in a particular region typically shows sharp nonstationarity over time.
definition_uz: Qiymatlari bir yoki bir nechta o'lchovlar bo'ylab o'zgarib turadigan xususiyat, odatda vaqt. Misol uchun, ma'lum bir do'konda sotiladigan cho'milish kiyimlari  soni statsionar emasligini ko'rsatadi, chunki bu raqam mavsumga qarab o'zgaradi. Ikkinchi misol sifatida, ma'lum bir hududda yig'ib olingan meva miqdori odatda vaqt o'tishi bilan keskin nostatsionarlikni ko'rsatadi.

definition_eng: The process of converting an actual range of values into a standard range of values, typically -1 to +1 or 0 to 1. For example, suppose the natural range of a certain feature is 800 to 6,000. Through subtraction and division, you can normalize those values into the range -1 to +1.
definition_uz: Haqiqiy qiymatlar diapazonini qiymatlarning standart diapazoniga aylantirish jarayoni, odatda -1 dan +1 gacha yoki 0 dan 1 gacha. Masalan, ma'lum bir xususiyatning tabiiy diapazoni 800 dan 6 000 gacha deylik. Ayirish va bo'lish orqali siz bu qiymatlarni -1 dan +1 oralig'ida normallashtirishingiz mumkin

definition_eng: Features represented as integers or real-valued numbers. For example, in a real estate model, you would probably represent the size of a house (in square feet or square meters) as numerical data.
definition_uz: Butun sonlar yoki haqiqiy sonlar sifatida ifodalangan xususiyatlar. Misol uchun, ko'chmas mulk modelida siz uyning o'lchamini (kvadrat fut yoki kvadrat metrda) raqamli ma'lumotlar sifatida ko'rsatishingiz mumkin.

definition_eng: A
definition_uz:
Siyrak vektor, unda:
Bitta element 1 ga o'rnatiladi.
Boshqa barcha elementlar 0 ga o'rnatiladi.
One hot encoding  odatda mumkin bo'lgan qiymatlarning cheklangan to'plamiga ega bo'lgan satrlarni yoki identifikatorlarni ifodalash uchun ishlatiladi. Misol uchun, ma'lum botanika ma'lumotlar to'plamida har biri o'ziga xos qator identifikatori bilan ko'rsatilgan 15 000 xil turlar mavjud. Xususiyat muhandisligining bir qismi sifatida siz ushbu satr identifikatorlarini vektorning o'lchami 15 000 bo'lgan bitta issiq vektor sifatida kodlashingiz mumkin.
